name: BIKE-COMPONENTS.DE Digital Gift Voucher
description: The digital voucher from bike-components.de – the perfect gift for all bike fans Whether for spontaneous surprises or specific wishes: With our digital voucher, you always hit the mark! Simply select the desired amount and add the voucher to the shopping cart. After purchase, you will receive the voucher with a personal code conveniently by email. Enter the code during the payment process in the shopping cart, the voucher amount will automatically be deducted from the total amount. After purchase, the voucher will be sent to you as a PDF file directly by email – the perfect last-minute gift! The gift voucher is valid for 36 months from the date of issue on the entire range on bike-components.de. Within this period, the voucher can be redeemed at any time. After the expiration of this period, the voucher loses its validity, and any remaining balance will expire. For the purchase of the digital voucher, you can use PayPal & Klarna - Immediate Transfer.
specs: {"Immediately available": "After purchase, you will receive the voucher immediately by email as a PDF – ideal for spontaneous gift ideas.", "Easy redemption": "The voucher contains a unique code that can be conveniently entered during the payment process on bike-components.de.", "Valid for all products": "Whether for mountain bike, gravel, or road bike – the voucher can be used for the entire range of our shop.", "Flexible partial usage": "The voucher amount can also be redeemed in stages, the remaining value stays on the individual code."}

description: The Alivio DH-T4050-1D dynamo hub by Shimano provides 1.5 watts The Alivio DH-T4050-1D is a dynamo hub by Shimano for touring bikes with Center Lock disc brakes that produces 1.5 watts of output power. name: Axa HR Traction Power Control Dynamo
description: Bringing light into darkness: the HR Dynamo from AXA The AXA HR Traction Power Control Dynamo is one of the most renowned flank dynamos on the market. Equipped with modern technology and an extra large wheel, this dynamo effortlessly provides more illuminant capability. Outfitted with a double bronze alloy and a stainless steel shaft for extra long service life. If your roller is worn out after years of use, it can be easily replaced. This dynamo is also equipped with an over-voltage diode, which restricts excessive current from being transferred to your front or rear light, so that your lights will not burn out. name: SON Deluxe Disc Center Lock Hub Dynamo
description: For self-sufficient light at all times: the Son Delux hub dynamo by SON The Son Delux is the first hub dynamo whose generator is specially designed for modern LED front lights (like Edelux and B&M Cyo). Since December 2009 the Son Delux - in conjunction with the SON Edelux - has StVZO approval for all wheel sizes (16" -28" ). In contrast to a halogen bulb, an LED is highly effective even at a partial load, i.e. when it is operated below its rated output. Therefore it is no longer necessary to build the dynamo in such a way that it already reaches its full power at the lowest possible speed. The Son Delux is therefore smaller and lighter than a hub dynamo for halogen lighting (SON 28). The power consumption at idle is reduced by 30 to 35% compared to the SON 28. However, in its robustness and in the high-quality built, the Son Delux corresponds to the SON 28. Version with Shimano centre lock disc (brake rotors licensed by Shimano). name: Sigma Blaze LED Rear Light w/ Brake Light - StVZO Approved
description: The Blaze LED rear light with a brake light by Sigma - for more visibility The Blaze LED rear light with the brake light from Sigma increases visibility and therefore your safety on the road with a visibility range of 500 meters and the brake light function. In the day and night mode, a brightness sensor registers the ambient light and automatically switches on the rear light in the dark. The rear light has a sporty design and weighs just 22 g. name: Wahoo TRACKR Radar LED Rear Light
description: Illuminate your ride with the Wahoo TRACKR Radar LED rear light with radar function, designed to enhance your visibility and safety on every journey. Connected to a Wahoo ELEMNT bike computer, other compatible cycling computers, or your smartwatch, it alerts you to approaching vehicles from up to 150 meters away.It also increases brightness when you slow down, warning others around you. This sleek accessory is powered by a durable Lithium-ion battery, ensuring a prolonged lighting duration of up to 20 hours, so you can ride from dusk till dawn without worrying about visibility. Although it does not have road traffic approval, its bright red illumination and IPX7 protection class make it a reliable companion for off-road adventures, providing complete protection against water ingress during immersion. The light features an intuitive charge indicator, alerting you when it's time to recharge, and supports easy mounting on the seatpost, making it a breeze to install and remove. With four distinct light modes to choose from, you can adjust the lighting according to your needs, whether you're navigating through dark trails or signaling your presence to others. The switch offers simple operation with settings for on, off, and lighting mode selection, ensuring you're always in control of your visibility. Enhance your cycling experience with this indispensable rear light, crafted for resilience, convenience, and optimal illumination.

Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: Knog Blinder Commuter 700 LED Front Light with StVZO Approval
description: Illuminate your ride with the Knog Blinder Commuter 700 LED front light designed specifically for e-bikes and pedelecs up to 25 km/h. This sleek, white front light not only ensures your path is well-lit with its maximum brightness of 117 Lux but also complies fully with road traffic regulations for bicycles according to §67 StVZO, making it a perfect companion for city, road, and cross-country adventures. Its IP67 rating guarantees that it is dustproof and protected against temporary submersion, ensuring durability in all weather conditions. The light is easy to mount on your handlebar, allowing for a hassle-free setup. With a simple on/off switch, operation is straightforward, ensuring you can focus on the road ahead. This light is designed to be powered by your e-bike's battery, seamlessly integrating into your ride without the need for an additional battery. Whether you're navigating through city streets or embarking on a touring adventure, this front light is an essential accessory for enhancing visibility and safety on your journeys.

name: Supernova M99 Pro 2 LED E-Bike 25 Front Light - StVZO Approved
description: The M99 Pro 2 LED e-bike front light from Supernova with StVZO approval for e-bikes up to 25 km/h with powerful high beam This M99 Pro 2 LED front light from Supernova is designed for e-bikes up to 25 km/h and has a powerful 3000 lumens in high beam mode. A light sensor recognises when darkness falls and automatically switches from daytime running light to low beam. One highlight is the option to connect components such as USB chargers or heated grips, as the front light also serves as a control centre with integrated energy storage and offers accessories with short-term high power consumption up to 30 W. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: Lupine C14 E-Bike Rear Light - StVZO Approved
description: The C14 E-Bike rear light with StVZO approval by Lupine becomes an integral part of your E-Bike The Lupine C14 E-Bike rear light with StVZO approval is saddle clamp and rear light in one. With the latest COB technology and powerful Fresnel lenses, the rear light has 240-degree visibility with reduced glare. The special arrangement of the LEDs together with an ingenious lens system ensures a homogeneous light characteristic. With an additional button you can switch off the rear light, e.g. when you are riding in a group or through the forest. An integrated stop lip ensures simple, defined assembly. Every seatpost can be reliably fixed in the seat tube with up to 7 NM. The C14 can be connected directly to the E-bike motor and is compatible with all current E-MTBs, whether Bosch, Shimano, Brose or Yamaha. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. impact and water resistant according to IPX645 lumens brightintegration into the seatpost clampcompatible with all current E-MTBs 1 x Lupine C14 rear light with integrated connecting cable3 x Lupine cable guides

name: Sigma Aura 80 Front Light + Blaze Rear Light w/ Brake Light LED Set - StVZO
description: The Aura 80 front light + Blaze rear light with a brake light LED light set by Sigma - a strong lighting and visibility duo The AURA 80 USB LED front light from Sigma impresses with a powerful illumination range of 90 metres. This means that the front light is always a safe companion, even off the beaten track. With its integrated battery and light mode indicator you always have an eye on the remaining battery status and the chosen light modes. The Blaze LED rear light with the brake light from Sigma increases visibility and therefore your safety on the road with a visibility range of 500 meters and the brake light function. In the day and night mode, a brightness sensor registers the ambient light and automatically switches on the rear light in the dark. name: Supernova Mini 2 Pro MonkeyLink LED E-Bike Front Light - StVZO Approved
description: The Mini 2 Pro LED Front Light by Supernova for e-bikes up to 25 km/h with MonkeyLink module and high beam The Supernova Mini 2 Pro LED front light with a bright 550 lumens high beam mode is easily installed on stems with MonkeyLink interface without any cables. The MonkeyLink system uses magnets and locking mechanisms to ensure a secure hold, and the power supply is provided by internally routed cables from the e-bike battery to the stem. MonkeyLink stemsBosch Gen4 CX 12 V LightportBosch Gen2 Performance Line HS 12 V / 18 WBrose as of 2019 model Drive T / SF / S / C 12.5 V/27.5 WFazua Evation 12 V / 24 W, 12 W (Connector Box)Giant 12 V / 18 WNeodrives UR-V5 12 V / 6 WNeodrives UR-V8 Integrale / Supercore 12 V / 18 WNeodrives Z20RS 12 V / 60 WPanasonic GX-0 as of 2019 model 13.5 V / 20 WShimano EP8 12 V / 24 WShimano STEPS E7000 12 V / 18 WSpecialized Turbo Levo 6 V / 14.6 WSpecialized Turbo Levo as of 2020 model 12 V / 24 WStromer as of 2018 model 12 V / 30 WTQ PIN 120 2017 model 12 V / 30 WTQ HPR 120S 12 V / 24 W with MonkeyLink module for wireless power supply and easy installation on MonkeyLink stemsfor E-bikes up to 25 km/hmagnetic high beam button with mount for 22 mm handlebar diameterTerraflux4 lens for good and even illuminationhigh beam with good illumination in curves and when suspension fork is submergedsaltwater-resistant anodised aluminium housing with cooling finsoptimised heat dissipation with heat sensorcompact shapeintegrated anti-theft deviceremote sensor cable length 212 mmpower consumption 5 - 10 W Terraflux4 lens The Terraflux lens is a milestone in optical development. For a lens of this size, it produces outstandingly bright and uniform illumination on the road and good ambient lighting above the cut-off line. With the Terraflux lens, you are noticed in traffic without directing glare at oncoming traffic. Thanks to a sophisticated light control system, the Terraflux lens directs 90% of the light to where it is needed most: the road. There it forms a broad and even blanket of light that extends from the front wheel to far away. The permanent daytime running light incorporated into the lens ensures that the rider is also very well visible in traffic during the day. At night, this light component is used for excellent ambient lighting and warns of low-hanging branches on the trail. name: Litemove TL03 rear light with StVZO approval
description: Designed to enhance your visibility and safety on every ride, the TL03 rear light from Litemove is specially designed for E-bikes and Pedelecs and is a must-have accessory for cycling enthusiasts. It mounts effortlessly on the seatpost, providing a secure and convenient installation. The rear light, emitting a bright red glow, offers two lighting modes: a standard mode with 11 lumens for ample visibility in most conditions and a high mode with 20 lumens for enhanced brightness when needed. With a lighting duration of 3.50 hours, it balances performance and efficiency. Whether you're navigating busy city streets, embarking on long tours, or enjoying off-road trails, this rear light ensures you're seen and safe, no matter where your rides take you.

name: busch+müller Lumotec IQ-X T SensoPlus LED Front Light - StVZO Approved
description: The most beautiful 100 lux ever: the IQ-X front light by busch+müller The lighting technology makes it possible to break the 100 lux benchmark using a dynamo front light - and this is combined with a very wide and homogenous area of illumination on the road. In addition to this high-quality technology, the IQ-X also has design: the housing, which also serves as a cooling system, is made of high-quality aluminium, available in silver or black. Slits in the mounting ring radiate brightly to the side, providing accents which also improve visibility, while the ergonomic operating button is embedded in a blue illuminated ring. This safety equipment is equipped as standard: a sensor-controlled daytime running light, standing light and a flexible multi-joint front light mount with an integrated cable duct, which also allows overhead installation. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . a flexible multi-joint headlamp holder with an integrated cable ductLED dynamo front lightsergonomic control buttonshigh-quality aluminium housingwith a switch for a hub dynamo IQ Technology The revolutionary light from busch+müller: a special reflector with an optimised cooling system uses a high-performance LED as an indirect light source. The LED is not visible any longer in the middle of the reflector. This creates a light field that is extremely evenly illuminated and can be twice as wide as conventional technology. Light effects can be positioned more precisely - for example, the near field in front of the front wheel can be additionally brightened. By the way: The standing light of the Lumotec headlights can run for many minutes. This is why the standing lights on Lumotec IQ models can also be switched off manually - so that no thief is tempted when the bicycle is parked. Automatic Sensor If a Lumotec front light has the addition of " sensor" in its name, it can switch on automatically at dusk or in the dark, and switches off automatically when driving in the light. For this to happen, a permanent power supply by a hub dynamo is required. To prevent the sensor from reacting " incorrectly" to short-term light signals like a car headlight, it is equipped with a delay. In the case of front lights with daytime running light function, the light sensor takes over the task of automatically switching between day and night modes. 1 x busch+müller Lumotec IQ-X T Senso Plus front lightincl. front reflectors, attachableincl. cable

name: SON Edelux II LED Front Light - StVZO Approved
description: Top-class all-round floodlight: the Edelux II Front Light by SON With an innovative light emitting diode and a reflector developed by lighting technology specialist busch+müller, Edelux II literally outshines its five-year older brother. The light field is twice as wide, even better focused in the distance and has an evenly illuminated near field illumination that starts close to the front wheel. This creates a uniformly bright area from approx. 2 m to over 20 m ahead, which makes it possible to detect obstacles in the distance at an early stage, even when riding fast. The light cone is well dimmed towards the top, which reduces glare for oncoming traffic. Now that you're unmissable, winding routes and slow riding on bad roads are no longer a problem. The Edelux, until now a top-class especially for high-speed riders, becomes an all-round floodlight.

BrakeTec The new BrakeTec Technology is a brake light function and is integrated into the rear light. However, no power connection to the brake is needed. LineTec LineTec is a patented light system with a special lens effect. The punctual light from high-power LEDs is fanned out into a wide light strip which illuminates evenly. A rear light with LineTec light band emits a " spatial" light. Therefore other road users can estimate the distance much better and faster. Manufacturer's Notice: The BrakeTec only works if the rear light is connected to a dynamo front light, whose rear light connections supply an alternating current. A brake light function is not possible in combination with front lights that supply a direct current to the rear light. All dynamo front lights from busch+müller are designed in such a way that the BrakeTec function is available without restrictions. 1 x busch+müller Toplight Line Brake Plus rear lightincl. mounting material

Whether on the way to school, on weekend trips, or during everyday rides, the plug-in LED is a small but powerful safety upgrade for your child’s helmet.

name: Sigma Helmet lamp
description: Illuminate your ride with the Sigma Buster 1600 HL LED white helmet lamp, designed to keep you visible and safe on any cycling adventure. Whether you're tearing through mountain bike trails, cruising city streets, or embarking on a long road tour, this versatile lamp has got you covered. It easily mounts to your helmet with a secure Velcro band, ensuring it stays in place no matter how bumpy the ride gets. With an IPX4 rating, it's resilient against splashes from all directions, so a little rain won't stop you from pushing forward. The lamp shines bright with a lighting range of up to 205 meters, making sure you can see and be seen. With a long-lasting battery life of 50 hours, it's ready for your longest rides. Choose from 6 different lighting modes to suit your environment and needs, including high, mid, low, eco, night flashing, and day flashing modes. This helmet lamp is not just an accessory; it's a necessity for any cyclist looking to enhance their visibility and safety on the road or trail.

name: LUMOS Firefly Single LED Helmet Light
description: LUMOS Firefly Single helmet light - 3-in-1 LED with smart functions Firefly is a compact LED auxiliary light for attachment to a bike helmet. It combines three different LEDs: a red one, a white one and a yellow one. This means that it can be used as an additional rear light, as an additional front light or as a flashing light, as desired. Firefly is powered by a rechargeable battery and recharged via a USB cable. The battery life is up to 35 hours, depending on the light mode. Thanks to Bluetooth compatibility, you can even let the light communicate with your LUMOS helmet, your remote control or the LUMOS app on your smartphone. In the single version, a single Firefly is supplied with mounting material. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . name: Wolf Tooth Components RoadLink Rear Derailleur Adapter
description: Adding a few gears: the RoadLink rear derailleur adapter by Wolf Tooth Components Wolf Tooth's RoadLink™ rear derailleur adapter is a unique device that shifts the position of your Road derailleur so that you can ride a wide range MTB cassette with it. The ideal solution for riders who want to equip their Road, Gravel, Cyclocross or commuter bike with an uncomplicated, light 1x drivetrain, but who do not want to do without the wide gear selection of a 2x drivetrain. Also for riders with 2x drivetrains who need even lower gears for ultra steep climbs. The RoadLink does not interfere with the shifting of the smaller sprockets of the cassette, but allows the rear derailleur to work with a cassette up to 40 teeth. The RoadLink is also very easy to install; experienced home mechanics only need 5 minutes. Rear Derailleur / Frame: 10-speed and 11-speed Shimano Road rear derailleurs (exceptDura-Ace R9100/R9150, Ultegra R8000/R8050, RX800/805, 105 R7000: useRoadLink DM)standard derailleur hangersnot compatible withDirect Mount framesalso works with 9-speed road gears, traditional SRAM rear derailleurs (notX-Horizon) and with Campagnolo rear derailleurs (here best with cassettes up to 11-36) Cassette: 11-34 10-speed cassettes11-36 10-speed cassettes11-40 10-speed cassettes11-34 11-speed cassettes11-36 11-speed cassettes11-40 11-speed cassettesnot compatible with11-42 10-speed, 11-42 11-speed, 10-42 11-speed cassettesnot required for 11-32 10-speed and 11-speed cassettes Drive: 1x and 2x shifting (2x only with GS cage, note rear derailleur capacity!)not compatible with3x shifters & derailleurs design patent pendingenables the use of Road derailleurs with MTB cassettes up to 40 T8 - 10 Nm tightening torqueMade in the USA RLINK 1 x Wolf Tooth Components RoadLink rear derailleur adapter1 x screw

name: Wolf Tooth Components RoadLink DM Rear Derailleur Adapter
description: For Direct Mount compatible Shimano rear derailleurs: the RoadLink DM rear derailleur adapter by Wolf Tooth Components The award-winning Wolf Tooth RoadLink has enabled road cyclists to extend the gear spread of their Shimano Road drivetrain - while keeping capacity and shifting performance virtually unchanged. The RoadLink DM (Direct Mount) is a further development of the RoadLink, which works with the current Shimano R9100 Dura Ace, R8000 Ultegra and R7000 105 rear derailleurs. As with the MTB-specific GoatLink, the Wolf Tooth RoadLink DM rear derailleur adapter offsets the rear derailleur, creating a clearance for wide-range cassettes while maintaining capacity and improving shifting. The result? Wider gear ratios that riders need and expect for their road, commuter, gravel or touring bikes. name: Wolf Tooth Components GoatLink 11 Rear Derailleur Adapter
description: The best of both worlds: the GoatLink 11 Rear Derailleur Adapter by Wolf Tooth Components It all began with a desire to ride Shimano 11-speed rear derailleurs and shifters with SRAM 10-42 XD cassettes without sacrificing performance. It took Wolf Tooth eight months to develop the Lindarets x Wolf Tooth GoatLink 11, which helps combine the reliability of Shimano rear derailleurs and shifters with the simplicity and smoothness of an SRAM 1x11-speed drivetrain. When using a 10-42 cassette, GoatLink 11 optimally positions the Shimano XT M8000 and XTR M9000 rear derailleur. You can also use the GoatLink for extended cassettes such as 10-44 Z XX1. name: Shimano Deore BB-MT501 Hollowtech II Bottom Bracket
description: Shimano Deore BB-MT501 bottom bracket for frames with BSA thread The Shimano BB-MT501 is a bottom bracket with a sleeve made of synthetic material designed to fit a 24 mm axle crankset into a frame with a BSA bearing. With the enclosed spacers, it is suitable for shell width of both 73 mm and 68 mm. Apart from Deore, Shimano recommends the BB-MT501 for the cranksets of the ZEE and Alivio series as well as for numerous no-group models from the MTB and touring sector. It features an optimised seal design that extends durability. Steel bearings ensure smooth rotation. The bearing cups are made of anodised aluminium. In combination with a corresponding crankset, this bottom bracket and its Hollowtech II technology ensures stability and efficiency with every pedal rotation. Recommended for: Deore FC-M6100, FC-M6120, FC-M6130Deore FC-M5100Deore FC-M6000, FC-M4100, FC-M617FC-MT610, FC-MT510, FC-MT511, FC-MT512FC-MT500, FC-M627FC-MT210, FC-MT200ZEE FC-M640, FC-M645CUES FC-U4010, FC-U6000, FC-U6010Deore FC-T6010Alivio FC-T4060FC-T551 anodised bearing cupsimproved seal designlong lifehigh rotation and drive efficiencyinner bearing sleeve made of synthetic resin Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. EBBMT501B Shimano BB-MT501 bottom bracket, consisting of: 1 x right bearing cup with bearings1 x left bearing cup with bearings1 x bottom bracket centre sleeve2 x spacer 2.5 mm1 x spacer 1.8 mm1 x spacer 0.7 mm bottom bracket toolTL-FC32orTL-FC36, or tool insertTL-FC33

name: SRAM GXP Bottom Bracket
description: Solid bearing technology for your SRAM/Truvativ cranks: the GXP Bottom Bracket by SRAM Truvativ The GXP system does not rely on a lateral load to adjust the bearing clearance as other systems do, but the left bearing is clamped between the bottom bracket axle and the left crank arm. This allows the right-hand bearing to move axially freely on the bottom bracket axle. This prevents premature bearing wear. name: SRAM XG-1275 12-speed Cassette for GX Eagle
description: The XG-1275 12-speed cassette for GX Eagle by SRAM - with wide gear range The SRAM XG-1275 cassette for GX Eagle has twelve shifting levels for riders who value reliability and durability. Mud and dirt do not stand a chance to get stuck between the sprockets in its open design. The FULL-PIN™ technology, which combines precision machined steel sprockets with high-resistance stainless steel pins results in a lighter, robust cassette with good self-cleaning abilities, smooth shifting and high durability. With 10-52 teeth, you get a huge range that will give you the right gear for even the toughest climbs. Or would you like to switch to a larger chainring and reach higher speeds without compromising the climbing ability? You have all the options! Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. 10-50: electronic XX1/X01 Eagle AXS 12-speed rear derailleursmechanical XX1/X01/GX/SX/NX Eagle 12-speed rear derailleurs, all models 10-52: electronic XX1/X01 Eagle AXS 12-speed rear derailleursCaution:The 10-52 gradation is only compatible with mechanical 12-speed rear derailleurs of theGX Eagle,X01 Eagleand XX1 Eagle series as of model 2020 and cannot be combined with older rear derailleurs. large range of 520 % with 10-52 teethoptimised switching stages over the entire rangeopen,mud resistant designcolour-coordinated with Eagle components FULL PIN™: The FULL-PIN technology uses eleven lightweight sprockets made of pressed steel, which are securely held together by 123 pins made of high-strength steel. The result is an light and durable cassette that is perfect for any ride with a wide gear ratio. Similar to the X-DOME™ cassette, the open design keeps out mud and dirt while ensuring clean shifts and long component life. X-Glide 2™: The X-Glide 2 is the next generation of X-Glide technology. It has been specially optimised for the Eagle 12-speed cassette - for fast and precise shifting performance in all gears. X-Glide technology increases chain tension on the larger sprockets. Models: 10-50: 10-52: 1 x SRAM XG-1275 cassette

name: Shimano XT CS-M8000 11-Speed Cassette
description: The XT CS-M8000 11-speed cassette by Shimano - advanced Rhythm Step options The Shimano XT CS-M8000 11-speed cassette offers the full range of 1x11-speed, 2x11-speed and 3x11-speed gear ratios, so there's something for every type of rider, terrain and performance level. Hyperglide (HG) technology ensures fast, precise index shifting via special tooth profiles and ramps. name: Shimano XT CS-M8100-12 12-Speed Cassette
description: Tackle every trail: the Shimano XT CS-M8100-12 Cassette The Shimano XT CS-M8100 12-speed cassette is available in 10-45 T and 10-51 T versions. If you are looking for the lowest possible amount of gear steps, then the 10-45 tooth version is a good pick. If you want to cover as much bandwidth as possible, then opt for the 10-51 tooth version. Of course, all CS-M8100-12 cassettes feature Shimano Hyperglide+ technology for high shifting speed, precision and ease in up-/down-shifting. This has the added benefit of minimising noise. The spider as well as the two largest sprockets are made of aluminium, which contributes to weight reduction, robustness and durability. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. 12-speed Micro Spline: Rear Derailleur: 1x12-speed with 10-51 t: RD-M9100-SGS, RD-M8100-SGS, RD-M7100-SGS, RD-M6100-SGS, RD-M8150-12, RD-RX822-SGS1x12-speed with 10-45 t: RD-M9100-GS, RD-M9120-SGS, RD-M8100-GS, RD-M8120-SGS, RD-M7120-SGS, RD-RX822-GS2x12-speed with 10-45 T: RD-M9120-SGS, RD-M8120-SGS, RD-M7120-SGS 12-speed Hyperglide+ cassette10-51: Wide range version, 10-45: Rhythm step versionfast and precise shifting performance optimised for any type of trailpedal during the shifting processlighter and stiffer construction reduces inertia and improves acceleration (Beam Spider)10 T sprocket as smallest sprocket, possible due to new freehub construction (Micro Spline)sprockets 1 to 10 made of steel (plated), 11 and 12 made of aluminium (anodised)sprocket carrier made of painted aluminium, anodised lock ring Hyperglide+ / HG+ Hyperglide+ is the efficient further development of the Hyperglide system by Shimano. These are shifting aids and specially shaped sprocket teeth that make shifting to larger or smaller sprockets suppler, smoother and quieter. The system of small rivets attached to the side of the sprocket and milled or pressed-in ramps ensures that the chain is already carried along by the next sprocket during the shifting process before it leaves the previous sprocket. Hyperglide+ is optimised for faster shifting and shifting under load and has a more efficient chain connection, holding power and power transfer when combined with a compatible HG chain. Compared to Hyperglide, the shifting time is reduced by one third and the pedal stroke is noticeably reduced. HG+ enables a completely new chain stability and thus offers a safe riding experience. Micro Spline Micro Spline is an innovative tooth profile on MTB freehub bodies from Shimano. All Shimano 12-speed MTB cassettes with a 10-tooth sprocket are equipped with Micro Spline freehub toothing. The significantly higher and finer toothing enables a stiffer connection between the cassette and the hub body. The resulting increased contact area ensures reliable power transmission, minimises wear and prevents deformation of the freehub and sprocket. 10-45: 10-51: 1 x Shimano XT CS-M8100-12 cassette1 x Shimano aluminium lockring

name: SRAM XG-1299 12-speed Cassette for XX1 Eagle
description: The XG-1299 12-speed cassette for XX1 Eagle by SRAM - wide gear range with a chic look The SRAM XG-1299 cassette with twelve gears for XX1 Eagle has a special, extremel durable finish and is light, stable and durable. With the different colour options, aesthetes who want to perfectly match the colour of their bike will also get their money's worth. Its X-Dome™ construction makes it particularly torsion-resistant, while the shifting process is quiet and smooth. With the possibility to use 10-52 teeth, the XG-1299 has a wide gear range for you, with which you don't have to step off the bike, even in the steepest climbs. Or would you like to switch to a larger chainring and reach higher speeds without sacrificing climbing ability? You have all the options!

name: Shimano XT CS-M771-10 10-Speed Cassette
description: Shimano XT 10-speed CS-M771-10 cassette - with 3+3 sprocket construction With the Shimano XT CS-M771-10 cassette, the six large sprockets are mounted on two spiders so that a large contact surface and a low weight can be achieved. Hyperglide technology (HG) ensures fast, smooth and silent gear changes, which are further supported by the Dyna-Sys system. Shimano's Dyna-Sys is not just about 10-speed gearing, but about optimal power transfer and traction. 11-32 only: RD-5701, RD-460111-32 / 11-34 only: RD-T780, RD-T670-A, RD-T610, RD-R350-10, RD-4700-GS optimised HG tooth profile for HG-X chain and Shadow rear derailleur: precise positioning, clean, consistent shifting6 sprockets on spider (3+3 construction): precise alignment, absolute stiffness, optimised for dynamic pedallinglockring made of aluminium (anodised)chrome finish (blasted) HG cassette Shimano Hyperglide cassettes (HG cassettes) have strategically-positioned ramps and special tooth profiles so that the chain can be completely guided directly onto the next sprocket. This prevents the chain from just touching the tips of the teeth before it actually touches down. This optimises the chain guide and enables fast, highly efficient shifting. name: Shimano 105 CS-R7101-12 12-speed Cassette
description: Shimano 105 CS-R7101 12-speed cassette - broad compatibility and maximum transmission efficiency The CS-R7101-12 is a 12-speed cassette from the Shimano 105 road bike series. In contrast to the CS-R7100, it's compatible with both electronic and mechanical groupsets. With only about 15 grams more weight than the Ultegra model, it offers fast and smooth shifting, even when you pedal hard. It has the same width as an 11-speed cassette, so the sprockets are closer together. This accommodates the speed and smoothness of shifting. The smallest of the 12 steel sprockets has 11 teeth and the largest 34, which means a very wide range that lets you find the right gear uphill, downhill and on flat terrain. This way you can move forward efficiently everywhere and maintain your flow. Also worth noting: the freehub of the CS-R7101 cassette is not only compatible with Shimano 12-speed freehub bodies, but also with conventional road freehub bodies. fast and smooth gear changes even at high torquessame width as 11-speed cassette due to closer-spaced sprocketswide range for any terraincompatible with 12-speed and 11-speed road freehub bodiessuitable for electronic and mechanical groupsetsnickel-plated sprocket and lockringanodised spider HG cassette Shimano Hyperglide cassettes (HG cassettes) have strategically-positioned ramps and special tooth profiles so that the chain can be completely guided directly onto the next sprocket. This prevents the chain from just touching the tips of the teeth before it actually touches down. This optimises the chain guide and enables fast, highly efficient shifting. 11-34: 1 x Shimano 105 CS-R7101-12 cassette1 x Shimano steel lockring

description: Discover the Eagle XS-1270 T-Type HG 12-speed cassette from SRAM, designed for the All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, and MTB enthusiasts seeking to elevate their ride. Whether you're climbing steep hills or racing down technical descents, this cassette provides smooth and reliable shifting every time. Its durable construction is built to withstand the rigors of off-road cycling, ensuring long-lasting performance on the trails. The Eagle XS-1270 T-Type is the perfect upgrade for riders looking to push their limits and enhance their mountain biking experience. Its compatibility and performance make it an essential component for your MTB arsenal. Get ready to experience unmatched control and efficiency on your next adventure. This cassette is a testament to Eagle's commitment to quality and innovation in the cycling world. Upgrade to the Eagle XS-1270 T-Type HG 12-speed cassette and feel the difference on every ride.

name: Shimano SLX CS-M7100-12 12-Speed Cassette
description: Shimano SLX CS-M7100-12 cassette - shifting performance for more fun on the trail The Shimano SLX CS-M7100 12-speed cassette is characterised by its Hyperglide+ technology, which ensures high precision and smoothness as well as shifting speed when shifting up or down. In addition, Hyperglide+ minimises noise. CS-M7100 cassettes feature an aluminium spider and sprocket (the largest sprocket), which saves weight and contributes to durability. If the lowest possible gear jumps are important to you, then go for the 10-45 version. If you want to cover as wide a range as possible, the 10-51 gradation is the right one for you. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. 12-speed Micro Spline: Rear Derailleur: 1x12-speed with 10-51 t: RD-M9100-SGS, RD-M8100-SGS, RD-M7100-SGS, RD-M6100-SGS, RD-M8150-12, RD-RX822-SGS1x12-speed with 10-45 t: RD-M9100-GS, RD-M9120-SGS, RD-M8100-GS, RD-M8120-SGS, RD-M7120-SGS, RD-RX822-GS2x12-speed with 10-45 T: RD-M9120-SGS, RD-M8120-SGS, RD-M7120-SGS 12-speed Hyperglide+ cassette10-51: Wide range version, 10-45: Rhythm step versionadvanced shifting performance for more confidence and more fun on any trailpedal during the shifting processlighter and stiffer construction reduces inertia and improves acceleration (Beam Spider)lighter drivetrain with 10 T sprocket as smallest sprocket and new freehub designsprockets 1 to 11 made of steel (plated), 12 made of aluminium (anodised)sprocket carrier made of painted aluminium, anodised lock ring Hyperglide+ / HG+ Hyperglide+ is the efficient further development of the Hyperglide system by Shimano. These are shifting aids and specially shaped sprocket teeth that make shifting to larger or smaller sprockets suppler, smoother and quieter. The system of small rivets attached to the side of the sprocket and milled or pressed-in ramps ensures that the chain is already carried along by the next sprocket during the shifting process before it leaves the previous sprocket. Hyperglide+ is optimised for faster shifting and shifting under load and has a more efficient chain connection, holding power and power transfer when combined with a compatible HG chain. Compared to Hyperglide, the shifting time is reduced by one third and the pedal stroke is noticeably reduced. HG+ enables a completely new chain stability and thus offers a safe riding experience. Micro Spline Micro Spline is an innovative tooth profile on MTB freehub bodies from Shimano. All Shimano 12-speed MTB cassettes with a 10-tooth sprocket are equipped with Micro Spline freehub toothing. The significantly higher and finer toothing enables a stiffer connection between the cassette and the hub body. The resulting increased contact area ensures reliable power transmission, minimises wear and prevents deformation of the freehub and sprocket. 10-45: 10-51: 1 x Shimano SLX CS-M7100-12 cassette1 x Shimano aluminium lockring

name: Shimano Ultegra CS-R8101-12 12-Speed Cassette
description: The Shimano Ultegra CS-R8101 12-speed Cassette - extensive compatibility and efficient shifting The CS-R8101-12 is a 12-speed cassette from the Shimano road bike series. In contrast to the CS-R8100, it is compatible with both electronic and mechanical groupsets. It features Hyperglide+ technology, which was first tested in the MTB sector and ensures seamless shifting even under heavy load. Even when you are riding out of the saddle or sprinting, you can shift safely and immediately. The gradations have been selected to ensure high gear efficiency in all situations as well as optimal acceleration. The enlarged teeth of the pinions also contribute to this. A special plus point is its compatibility: CS-R8101 not only fits on the special 12-speed freehub body, but can also be used with conventional Shimano road freehub bodies. All sprockets are made of steel, with two lightweight aluminium sprocket carriers. The system of small rivets attached to the side of the sprocket and milled or pressed-in ramps ensures that the chain is already carried along by the next sprocket during the shifting process before it leaves the previous sprocket. Hyperglide+ is optimised for faster shifting and shifting under load and has a more efficient chain connection, holding power and power transfer when combined with a compatible HG chain. Compared to Hyperglide, the shifting time is reduced by one third and the pedal stroke is noticeably reduced. name: SRAM XG-1250 12-speed Cassette for Rival
description: The Rival XG-1250 Cassette by SRAM - Entry-level model with a wide bandwidth The SRAM Rival XG-1250 cassette offers budget-conscious road, gravel or cross-bike riders smooth gear ratios and a durable design. Starting with a 10-tooth sprocket, a wide range of ratios are opened up to you. FULL-PIN™ construction makes the cassette light and dirt-resistant, while X-Range™ technology ensures immediate shifting. The XG-1250 is optimised for use with electronic AXS shift components. more uniform gear gradation through at least three gear steps with only one tooth difference eachinitial sprocket with 10 teeth for a larger gear ratio range10-36 version for widest bandwidthnickel-chrome finish for durability and silent operationlight and durable with FULL PIN X-Range™: The X-Range technology was developed with the possibilities of today's dropbar bikes in mind. It is distinguished by a wide gear range with smooth, even gear changes. The combination of chainrings with 13-tooth spacing with a high bandwidth cassette, starting with a 10-tooth sprocket, ensures well thought-out, homogeneous gear jumps and always puts you in the right gear. In combination with AXS, you can make various shift settings and personalise your drivetrain to suit you. FULL PIN™: FULL-PIN technology uses lightweight pressed steel spiders held securely together with high-strength stainless steel pins. The result is an extremely light and durable cassette that is perfect for any ride with an ultra-wide gear ratio. Similar to the X-DOME™ cassette, the open design keeps out mud and dirt while ensuring clean shifts and long component life. 10-30: 10-36: 1 x SRAM XG-1250 cassette

name: SRAM PC GX Eagle 12-Speed Chain
description: Eagle stands for freedom. The freedom to set new goals and achieve them. It frees you from limitations and complexity. More than what has been done before. The translation bandwidth combines dedication and technology, combining precision and the highest reliability. Here, simplicity and power go hand in hand. A completely new system to discover new horizons. This is Eagle. There is still much to discover. Designed to SRAM Eagle geometry, the GX Eagle chain features full pins, Eagle PowerLock® and offers smooth, efficient shifting you can rely on every ride. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. Flow Link™: The ultra smooth inner plates of the chain are completely edge-free. This reduces friction on the cassette and chainring. The result: low-noise performance and longer component life. The chain design allows for a narrower profile. This way, the chain is much more torsion resistant. Due to their smooth outer flaps, the riveting is more uniform and the tensile strength is higher. PowerLock®: SRAM chain engineers developed PowerLock® as a tool-free, secure and consistent way to connect SRAM chains. Although PowerLock® does not require any special tools for assembly, given the narrow tolerance range of a 10-, 11- and 12-speed drive, each PowerLock® should only be used once. X-Sync 2™: X-Sync 2™ Eagle is the latest development of the SRAM X-Sync™technology. The tooth profile of the chainring increases the chain tension and efficiency when pedalling. The life of the chainring is longer because X-Sync™ Eagle technology reduces friction and dirt. 00.2518.030.011 1 x SRAM PC GX Eagle chain1 x SRAM PowerLock™ FlowLink master link™

name: SRAM PC XX1 Eagle 12-speed chain
description: Elevate Your Ride with the SRAM PC XX1 Eagle 12-speed Chain Experience the pinnacle of cycling performance with the SRAM PC XX1 Eagle 12-speed chain, designed for the most demanding Cross Country, All Mountain, Enduro, and MTB applications. This chain isn't just about durability; it's about providing a seamless connection between you and the trail. With its hollow pins, this chain is engineered for lightweight strength, ensuring that every pedal stroke propels you forward with maximum efficiency. Compatible with SRAM XX1 Eagle and X01 Eagle , this chain guarantees smooth shifting across all terrains, enhancing your bike's performance and your overall riding experience. The inclusion of a PowerLock master link closure ensures reliable, tool-free connection for easy maintenance and peace of mind on long rides. Whether you're pushing your limits on a steep climb or cruising through a technical descent, the PC XX1 Eagle chain is your trusted companion for a flawless ride. Upgrade to this chain and feel the difference in every shift, every climb, and every sprint. It's not just a component; it's the heartbeat of your bike.

name: SRAM PC XX1 Eagle 12-Speed Chain
description: The PC XX1 Eagle 12-speed chain by SRAM is lightweight, quiet and stable The SRAM PC XX1 chain is made for Eagle 12-speed drives and stands out on your mountain bike with a light, durable design and different color options. Hollow pins make the chain light, while Flow Link™ technology with smooth, flat link plates ensure precise, smooth shifting and almost silent operation. The chain is uncompromisingly strong without any loss of performance and extremely wear-resistant. Even aesthetes get their money's worth thanks to the colour selection matched to Eagle components. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. Eagle drivetrains chrome-plated inner plates with PVD coatingnickel-plated outer plates with PVD coatingFlow Link and Hard Chrome™ technologies for less wearcolour matching Eagle componentsquiet, light and durablestrong PowerLock master link Flow Link™: The ultra smooth inner plates of the chain are completely edge-free. This reduces friction on the cassette and chainring. The result: low-noise performance and longer component life. The chain design allows for a narrower profile. This way, the chain is much more torsion resistant. Due to their smooth outer flaps, the riveting is more uniform and the tensile strength is higher. Hard Chrome™: Chains with Hard Chrome have a four times higher (wear) resistance than other SRAM chains. This is due to the machining process for the inner links and rollers. The push-pin resistance and the overall resistance correspond to current SRAM chains. Chains with Hard Chrome last longer and are extremely stable. PowerLock™ SRAM have developed PowerLock as a tool-free, safe and consistent way to connect SRAM chains. Although the PowerLock master link does not require any special tools for assembly, each PowerLock can only be used once due to the narrow tolerance range of modern drivetrains. X-Sync™: Chains with X-Sync technology are perfectly matched for use with X-Sync chainrings. X-Sync chainrings by SRAM provide the highest performance and durability. The long X-Sync tooth edges grip the chain earlier than traditional triangular teeth. The sharp and narrow tooth profile and the rounded sloping edges support chain guiding: To provide the best possible performance even on muddy terrain, the X-Sync chainrings have indentations for the inner chain links and rollers to remove dirt and mud. The colour of the PowerLock master link does not match the chain colour. 1 x SRAM PC XX1 Eagle chain1 x SRAM PowerLock master link

name: SRAM PC 1051 10-speed Chain
description: Experience Smooth Shifting with the SRAM PC 1051 10-Speed Chain Elevate your cycling experience with the SRAM PC 1051 10-Speed Chain, designed for both MTB and road applications. This versatile chain is engineered to meet the demands of 10-speed cassettes, ensuring seamless gear transitions and optimal performance on any terrain. With a size of 1/2" x 11/128", it strikes the perfect balance between weight and durability, making it an excellent choice for cyclists who demand reliability and efficiency. The non-directional design simplifies installation and maintenance, while the innovative chain link closure system provides a secure, tool-free connection, enhancing your bike's functionality and safety. Whether you're climbing steep hills or sprinting on flat roads, the SRAM PC 1051 chain is built to support your cycling adventures without compromising on speed or performance. It's not just a chain; it's the upgrade that your bike has been waiting for. Get ready to experience smoother shifts and a more enjoyable ride with SRAM's commitment to quality and innovation.

description: Guidelines for Replacing E-bike Components:Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through theguidelinesfor component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance.Technical Information:Application:MTB, XC, Trail, EnduroMaterial:steelGearing:12-speedLinks:126Outer Plate:silver / nickel-platedInner Plate:silver / chrome platedMaster Link:PowerLock™ FlowlinkPin Type:hollow pins, chromium platedRecommended Groupset:SRAM X01 Eagle, SRAM XX1 EagleTechnology:FlowLink, Hard Chrome™, PowerLock™, X-Sync™Compatibility:SRAM X01 Eagle rear derailleurs, cranks and cassettesSRAM XX1 Eagle rear derailleurs, cranks and cassettesTechnology:Flow Link:The ultra smooth inner plates of the chain are completely edge-free. This way, the chain is much more torsion resistant. Due to their smooth outer flaps, the riveting is more uniform and the tensile strength is higher.Hard Chrome™:The chain has a four times higher (wear) strength than the other SRAM chains. Although PowerLock™ does not require any special tools for assembly, given the narrow tolerance range of a 10-/11-speed drive, each PowerLock™ should only be used once.X-Sync™:X-Sync™ 1x chainrings by SRAM provides the highest performance and durability. Long SRAM X-Sync™ tooth edges grip the chain earlier than standard triangular teeth. The sharp and narrow tooth profile as well as the rounded slanted edges support the chain guide: In order to offer the best possible performance even on muddy terrain, the X-Sync™ chainrings have recesses to remove dirt and mud for the inner chain links and rollers. German-made X-Sync™ chainrings are an important part of SRAM 1x drivetrains.Manufacturer Number:00.2518.023.011Contents:1 x SRAM PC X01 Eagle chain1 x SRAM PowerLock™ FlowLink master link™

name: SRAM PowerLock Master Link for Road 12-speed - 4 PCS
description: Maximum reliability with the SRAM PowerLock master link for 12-speed RoadThe SRAM PowerLock master link for 12-speed Road, supplied in a pack of four, is suited for Road, Cyclocross, Gravel, Triathlon and Time Trial. It provides a secure and stable chain connection and is engineered to work precisely with SRAM drivetrains. Four links give you spares for maintenance or multiple bikes. Once fitted, the chain can be opened and closed without tools using the PowerLock link. A comfortable solution for easy maintenace of your drivetrain.

name: SRAM Red E1 12-/13-speed PowerLock Chain
description: Get ready to elevate your road cycling experience with the Red E1 12-/13-speed PowerLock Chain by SRAM, designed specifically for road applications. This top-tier chain is compatible with both 12-speed and 13-speed cassettes, ensuring versatility and peak performance on every ride. With a size of 1/2" x 11/128", it's engineered for precision and durability. The hollow pin design not only reduces weight but also maintains strength for those demanding sprints and climbs. Its unique PowerLock chain link closure system offers a secure, tool-free connection, making installation and maintenance a breeze. Plus, its directional design means you can expect smooth, efficient shifts every time, with reduced chances of misalignment. Whether you're gearing up for a race or a leisurely ride, this chain is built to deliver unmatched performance and reliability. Upgrade to the Red E1 chain and feel the difference in your pedal stroke, knowing you're riding with one of the best chains in the market.

name: Shimano XTR / Dura-Ace / E-bike Quick-Link CN-M9100 12-speed Chain
description: The XTR CN-M9100 12-speed chain by Shimano - enlarged inner plates The Shimano CN-M9100 chain for XTR and Dura-Ace 12-speed has enlarged inner plates which create a perfect connection to the Dynamic Chain Engagement+ chainring. In this way, it contributes significantly to smooth shifting performance. Vibrations are avoided, chain hold is improved and pedalling efficiency is increased (HG technology). The SIL-TEC coating of the outer plates and rollers ensures smoother, low-wear running. CN-M9100 chains come with hollow-formed pins to save weight and are directional. As they are approved for e-bikes, there is also an extra-long version with 138 links. The matching SM-CN910-12 Quick-Link master link is included. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. MTB 1x12-speed, 2x12-speedDura-Ace, Ultegra, 105 2x12-speedGRX 1x12-speed, 2x12-speede-bike: EP8 EP800 for MTB / Touring, STEPS E8080 HG chain for 1x12, 2x12SIL-TEC coating on outer plate and roller, chrome-plated inner plateenlarged inner platesimproved shift behaviourmore even riding in rough terrainwith master link for easy installationperformance indicator: ultimate (3 out of 3) HG 12-speed for Hyperglide+ Shimano Hyperglide (HG) 12-speed chains have enlarged inner plates designed to work with Hyperglide+ cassettes and Dynamic Chain Engagement+ chainrings. This prevents vibrations when the chainring and chain come into contact, resulting in improved chain retention. In combination with an HG+ 12-speed cassette, shifting and drive efficiency are increased. This also benefits the service life of the chain. HG 12-speed chains are directional, i.e. they have an asymmetrical design and thus a predefined installation direction. SIL-TEC SIL-TEC is a fluorine particle-based surface coating from Shimano. It results in smoother, lower friction operation and less contamination. This makes maintenance easier, reduces wear and extends the service life of SIL-TEC components. 1 x Shimano XTR / Dura-Ace CN-M9100 chain1 x Shimano SM-CN910-12 Quick-Link master link

name: Shimano Ultegra / Dura-Ace / 105 CN-6701 10-speed Chain
description: Shimano CN-6701 Ultegra / Dura-Ace / 105 10-speed Chain - Improved performance The Shimano CN-6701 chain is designed for 2x10-speed drivetrains. Thanks to optimised outer lugs, it delivers improved performance for road bikes while maintaining the same durability and weight (compared to the CN-6700). HG technology ensures optimised contact with the chainring and cassette teeth and therefore smooth shifting. Caution, CN-6701 is directional, which must be taken into account during assembly. for all Shimano 2x10-speed road bike drivetrains super slim HG 10-speed chainoptimised outer plates (zinc-aluminium-coated) for smooth shifting and less chain jamming in frontoptimised inner plates (grey) for smoother rear shiftingperforated, ultralight platesless stress when shifting under loadsmooth shifting even under high loadimproved press-fit construction for stable shiftingperformance indicator: advanced (level 2 out of 3) HG (Hyperglide) The links on Shimano Hyperglide chains are shaped to make optimum contact with the teeth of the chainring. This ensures smooth gear changes, even under load. In addition, the HG technology improves the efficiency of your pedal stroke. Directional The chain has an asymmetrical design. The specially-shaped tabs optimise engagement on the sprocket and result in even smoother shifting, even under load. The inner side is optimised for rear HG (Hyperglide) shifting and ensures fast and precise gear changes. The outer side is optimised for chainring changes. The sides are marked accordingly to ensure that the chain is fitted correctly. The side with the marking is the outside. Warning: The high shifting performance is only achieved with correct chain assembly. If the chain is fitted the wrong way round, it can come off and serious injury can result. name: SRAM PowerLock T-Type Master Link for Eagle Transmission 12-speed
description: Unlock Your Ride's Potential with the PowerLock T-Type master link for Eagle Transmission 12-Speed by SRAM The SRAM PowerLock T-Type master link is the suitable solution for 12-speed Eagle Transmission drivetrains — ideal for All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro and Gravel. It creates a secure connection for the chain and enables easy chain maintenance without any tools. Since the master link is not directional, installation is straightforward and error-free. Robustly constructed, it ensures reliable function and long durability on demanding trails. Whether steep climbs or fast descents — with the PowerLock T-Type master link your drivetrain stays securely closed and ready for use at all times.

So, gear up with the Deore CN-M6100 and experience the difference a high-quality chain can make on your ride.

name: Shimano 105 FC-R7000 11-speed Chainring
description: The Shimano 105 11-speed Chainring for FC-R7000 Cranks This Shimano 11-speed chainring is a spare part for the 105 FC-R7000 crank. It works together with the other front drive components precisely and quickly. The 4-arm chainrings have an asymmetrical 110 mm bolt circle diameter and can be assembled into three different combinations. The versions 34 to 39 teeth are made of aluminium, 50 to 53 teeth of an aluminium-plastic composite. Of course, there are two different colour options so that the chainring can be matched to the colour of the crank. 105 FC-R7000also fits Ultegra FC-R8000 anodised 34 tooth: 36 tooth: 39 tooth: 50 tooth: 52 tooth: 53 tooth: The type designation (one or two characters) helps identify the compatibility of various chainrings with other chainrings. Because the larger chainrings have specially-formed teeth and upward shifting assistance, only particular smaller chainrings will match to ensure proper shifting performance. An XY chainring should only be combined with another XY chainring. This applies to all other types as well. 1 x Shimano 105 FC-R7000 chainring

name: SRAM X-Sync 2 Chainring for X01/XX1/GX Eagle, 104 mm
description: The X-Sync™ 2 Eagle chainring is radically new. SRAM's engineers studied the performance and wear of thousands of X-Sync™ chainrings. Chainrings of every size were subjected to every conceivable stress, both in the test lab and off-road. The goal was a chainring that increases the performance of the Eagle groupset under all operating conditions. The result: the chainring teeth are longer and shaped like a saw blade to perfectly engage the Eagle chain. The new chainring thus increases chain tension and efficiency when pedalling. At the same time, friction, chain noise and wear are reduced. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: Wolf Tooth Components 110 BCD Gravel / CX / Road Chainring
description: The Wolf Tooth Components 110 BCD Gravel / CX / Road chainring can be used for 5-arm cranks with 110 mm bolt circle and is also compatible with Flattop chains. Crank: 5-arm cranks with 110 mm bolt circle diameternotcompatible with Shimano Dura-Ace 9000 or Ultegra 6800notcompatible with Campagnolo CX10/11 Chain: all 9-speed, 10-speed and 11-speed chainsSRAM Flattop, SRAM Eagle, Campagnolo and KMC 12-speed chains10-speed chain recommended for 9-speed drivetrains Chainring Bolts: 6 mm boltsfor 1x (original bolts for 2x do not fit) Wolf Tooth Wide-Narrow designmounting position outside or inside (sufficient distance to chainstay provided)chainline varies with mounting positionMade in the USA Drop-Stop® B Wolf Tooth has invested countless hours in the design, prototyping and testing of their Wide-Narrow chainrings and has developed a highly innovative tooth profile. Test riders around the world have confirmed that this design brings unparalleled performance. The right side of the chainring tooth has a different shape than the left side. The right side transmits the power to the chain and the left side opens a free space for cleaning mud and dirt. Since the two sides have completely different functions, it makes sense to design them differently, true to the motto: extra reinforcement where you need it, less material where you don't. The right side of the Drop-Stop tooth is as wide as possible to distribute the load over a larger area, which also minimises wear. The left side of the Drop-Stop tooth helps to guide the chain, but it does not transmit any load. Therefore the left side is narrower than the chain roller. Wear is not an issue on this side, so Wolf Tooth was able to save material and create a better mud clearance channel. More free space means less friction and less change of the chain being dropped due to mud. In the B version, the drop-stop profile is optimised for use on wheels with drop bars. The teeth are slightly narrower and the valleys between the teeth are deeper to accommodate the larger rollers of SRAM Flattop chains. The outer sides of the narrow and wide teeth touch the chain to guide it. 1 x Wolf Tooth Components 110 BCD Gravel / CX / Road chainring

description: Get ready to elevate your ride with the Thread Mount chainring for SRAM XX/XX SL PM 0 mm Oval from Garbaruk, designed specifically for All Mountain, Cross Country, and MTB enthusiasts. Crafted by the experts for those who demand precision and performance, this oval chainring is your ticket to a smoother, more efficient power delivery. Compatible with a wide range of speeds, from 9-speed to 13-speed cassettes, it ensures that you're always in the right gear, no matter the terrain. The oval design optimizes pedal stroke, reducing fatigue and enhancing your overall riding experience. With a direct thread mount system, installation is straightforward, allowing you to quickly upgrade and hit the trails. Its 0 mm offset ensures perfect alignment with your drivetrain, offering silent and seamless operation. Whether you're tackling steep climbs, technical descents, or just enjoying a leisurely ride through the countryside, this chainring is built to boost your performance and enjoyment. Embrace the future of cycling with this cutting-edge accessory that's designed to keep you ahead of the pack. Make every ride unforgettable with the Thread Mount chainring - where technology meets the trail.

name: Garbaruk Thread Mount chainring for SRAM XX/XX SL PM 3 mm Oval
description: Get ready to elevate your ride with the Thread Mount chainring for SRAM XX/XX SL PM 3 mm Oval, designed specifically for the all-mountain, cross-country, and MTB enthusiasts out there. This high-quality chainring from Garbaruk is your ticket to a smoother, more efficient pedaling experience, thanks to its oval design. With compatibility across a wide range of speeds, including 9-speed, 10-speed, 11-speed, 12-speed, and even 13-speed cassettes, this chainring is versatile and ready to adapt to your riding needs. The 3 mm offset ensures optimal chain alignment, providing you with a quieter ride and reduced wear on your drivetrain components. Whether you're tackling steep climbs or fast descents, the oval shape of the chainring maximizes power transfer and efficiency at every pedal stroke. It's a breeze to install on your SRAM XX or XX SL crankset, making it an ideal upgrade for riders looking to enhance their performance on the trails. Durable and built to last, this chainring is your partner for countless adventures on the mountain. So, gear up and prepare to experience the difference in your ride with the SRAM Thread Mount chainring – your bike will thank you.

name: Enduro Bearings Deep Groove Ball Bearing 6902 15 mm x 28 mm x 7 mm
description: Carefully manufactured, highly precise: the 6902 bearings by Enduro Bearings You can choose between ABEC 3 steel bearings (type 1), MAX bearings (type 2), MAX BO bearings (type 3), MAX-E bearings (type 4) and stainless steel bearings (type 5). ABEC 3 bearings from Enduro Bearings feature 10th-degree chrome steel balls that are twice as round as the industry standard, and manufactured to the highest standard. The treads are made of a 52100 carbon chrome steel alloy that is vacuum-generated and then hardened for extra strength and durability. A high-gloss polish ensures precision and low noise. MAX bearings are characterised by a 35 to 40 % higher load capacity than standard radial bearings. For 20 years Enduro Bearings has been manufacturing them specifically for use on mountain bike shocks. As its name indicates, MAX bearings are fitted with the maximum possible number of balls. The grooves in the races are deeper to accommodate the multiple lateral turning forces at the MTB rear pivot. MAX BO (Black Oxide) bearings receive an additional magnetite treatment and therefore have almost as high a corrosion resistance as stainless steel. The inner edge, which is wider than the outer edge, is characteristic of MAX-E bearings. This makes it possible to do without spacers. The stainless steel bearings from Enduro Bearings are based on bearing balls and running surfaces made of 440C stainless steel. This material ensures maximum corrosion resistance in critical applications and environments. Stainless steel has 20% less load capacity than the 52100 chrome steel alloy used in most other Enduro Bearings, but it is far superior in terms of rust resistance. Seals and CRC marine grease provide additional water resistance. If you live in a rainy area and/or you don't leave your bike in the rain, 440C stainless steel bearings are for you. They can also be useful for headsets, as drops of sweat may be a problem there. name: Enduro Bearings Deep Groove Ball Bearing 6802 15 mm x 24 mm x 5 mm
description: Carefully manufactured, highly precise: the 6802 bearings by Enduro Bearings You can choose between ABEC 3 steel bearings (type 1), MAX bearings (type 2) and stainless steel bearings (type 3). ABEC 3 bearings from Enduro Bearings feature 10th-degree chrome steel balls that are twice as round as the industry standard, and manufactured to the highest standard. The treads are made of a 52100 carbon chrome steel alloy that is vacuum-generated and then hardened for extra strength and durability. A high-gloss polish ensures precision and low noise. MAX bearings are characterised by a 35 to 40 % higher load capacity than standard radial bearings. For 20 years Enduro Bearings has been manufacturing them specifically for use on mountain bike shocks. As its name indicates, MAX bearings are fitted with the maximum possible number of balls. The grooves in the races are deeper to accommodate the multiple lateral turning forces at the MTB rear pivot. The stainless steel bearings from Enduro Bearings are based on bearing balls and running surfaces made of 440C stainless steel. This material ensures maximum corrosion resistance in critical applications and environments. Stainless steel has 20% less load capacity than the 52100 chrome steel alloy used in most other Enduro Bearings, but it is far superior in terms of rust resistance. Seals and CRC marine grease provide additional water resistance. If you live in a rainy area and/or you don't leave your bike in the rain, 440C stainless steel bearings are for you. They can also be useful for headsets, as drops of sweat may be a problem there. name: REVERSE Components HG Single Speed Kit 13T
description: This high-quality HG Single Speed Kit from REVERSE Components, made of steel, is the perfect choice for anyone looking for a reliable and durable product for their bike. This sprocket kit is suitable for a wide range of uses including cross-country, all-mountain, and MTB. It is compatible with Shimano HG chains in 8-speed, 9-speed, 10-speed, and 11-speed versions, offering broad compatibility and easy integration into existing setups. The robust steel construction ensures long-lasting performance and withstands even the toughest conditions. Ideal for riders who value quality and versatility.

name: SRAM Red/Force BB30 M18/M30 crank bolt with extractor
description: Maximize Your Ride with the Red/Force BB30 M18/M30 crank bolt with extractor by SRAM Experience the perfect blend of durability and efficiency with the Red/Force BB30 M18/M30 crank bolt with extractor from SRAM, designed specifically for your cycling needs. This high-quality crank arm screw is crafted from robust aluminum, ensuring long-lasting performance and resistance against wear and tear. Its sleek design is not just about looks; it's about providing you with the reliability you need for every ride. With a thread size of M18, this screw is compatible with a wide range of cranksets, making it a versatile addition to your bike maintenance kit. The inclusion of an extractor simplifies the removal process, making it easier for you to upgrade or maintain your crankset without the hassle. Designed for a maximum torque of 54 Nm, it gives you the confidence to tighten it to the perfect level for optimal performance. The tool grip compatibility with an Allen key (hex key) means you likely already have the necessary tool at hand. Whether you're a professional cyclist or a weekend warrior, this crank bolt is an essential component for ensuring your bike is in top condition.

The chainring is not mounted directly but via a 4-arm spider. You can choose between 30 and 32 tooth. Thanks to the 2-piece construction, a balanced ratio of stiffness to weight is ensured. name: Shimano Ultegra FC-R8100 Hollowtech II Crankset
description: The Ultegra FC-R8100 Crankset by Shimano - For highly efficient power transfer The Shimano FC-R8100 crankset converts the power you put into your Ultegra 2x12-speed road bike groupset into propulsion with high efficiency. Thanks to the proven Hollowtech II design, it meets all your requirements for stiffness and stability. You also benefit from the precise and fast shifting processes you are used to from Shimano drives. The crank arms are hollow-formed, as is the large chainring, which is partly made of carbon, resulting in significant weight savings. Apart from the axle, all essential parts were made of lightweight metal. FC-R8100 has an asymmetrical 4-arm bolt circle diameter of 110 mm. It produces a chainline of 44.5 mm and has a Q-factor of 148 mm. 2x12-speed: perfect balance between stiffness, stability, weight and rotational efficiencyoptimised power transferfast, high-precision shifting at the fronthollow crank arms (Hollowtech)hollow-formed large chainring made of aluminium-carbon composite (Hollowglide)anodised crank arms and chainringsaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. 1 x Shimano Ultegra FC-R8100 crankset (34-50or36-52 tooth)1 x Shimano crank bolt

name: Shimano 105 FC-R7100 Hollowtech II Crankset
description: Shimano 105 FC-R7100 2x12-speed Crank - Highly efficient and amazingly lightweight The FC-R7100 is the matching 2x crank for the 105 R7100 12-speed groupset from Shimano and brings maximum power transfer efficiency to your road bike. At the same time, shifting is as fast and precise as usual. The crank weighs only about 50 grams more than the comparable Ultegra model, which is mainly due to the hollow-formed aluminium crank arms. Thanks to the Hollowtech II design, which has been tried and tested for years, with a fixed 24 mm axle, the ratio of stiffness, performance and weight is just right. The small chainring is made entirely of aluminium, while durable composite is also used on the large chainring. FC-R7100 has an asymmetrical 4-arm bolt circle diameter of 110 mm. It produces a chainline of 44.5 mm and has a Q-factor of 148 mm. 2x12-speed: perfect balance between stiffness, stability, weight and rotational efficiencyoptimised power transferfast, high-precision shifting at the fronthollow crank arms (Hollowtech)anodised crank arms and chainringsstainless steel chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. 1 x Shimano 105 FC-R7100 crankset (34-50 tooth)1 x Shimano crank bolt

name: SRAM Red E1 DUB 2x12-speed Carbon Crankset
description: The Red E1 DUB 2x12-speed crankset from SRAM with carbon - low weight, maximum performance This SRAM Red E1 DUB crankset with hollow carbon arms is the ideal addition to the 2x12-speed drivetrain of your road bike. The one-piece construction is not only 29 g lighter than its predecessor, but also stiffer and sturdier. The X-Range technology promises precise and smooth shifting with a wide range. Thanks to DUB technology, the crankset is extremely durable and perfectly matched to DUB bottom brackets. 2x12-speed crankset with carbon arms for road bikesDirect Mount assembly, thus lighter and stiffer chainring possibledirect, precise shiftingdurable and simple thanks to DUB technologysubsequent upgrade to a power meter possible DUB The unit of crankshaft and bottom bracket is the heart of the DUB technology. Stiffness meets durability. SRAM has gone a step further and made everything even easier and better. It is mainly the system approach through the integration of chainring, crank, spindle and bottom bracket that means better drivetrain performance. X-Range The X-Range technology was developed with the possibilities of today's dropbar bikes in mind. It is distinguished by a broad gear range with smooth, even gear changes. The combination of chainrings with 13-tooth spacing with a high bandwidth cassette, starting with a 10-tooth sprocket, ensures well thought-out, homogeneous gear jumps and always puts you in the right gear. In combination with AXS, you can make various shift settings and personalise your drivetrain to suit you. 1 x SRAM Red E1 DUB 2x12-speed carbon crankset2 x SRAM chainring

name: Shimano XT FC-M8100-1 Hollowtech II Crank
description: The Shimano XT FC-M8100-1 crank provides a smoother ride The FC-M8100 12-speed XT crank from Shimano produces a chainline of 52 mm when ridden with a single chainring, and is suitable for frames with both 142 mm and 148 mm over locknut dimensions. The crank is based on a direct-mount system, which ensures a quick chainring change. Combine it with a Shimano Dynamic Chain Engagement+ chainring with a high-precision tooth profile (not included) and you get a front drivetrain of the highest efficiency and low noise that guarantees good chain retention. The stiff and light design of the FC-M8100 with its hollow-forged crank arms helps to increase fun and efficiency on any kind of trail. By the way, the crank can also be fitted with two chainrings, resulting in the model FC-M8100-2 for 48.8 mm chainline. name: SRAM Rival 1 Crankset - Workshop packaging
description: Get ready to elevate your cycling experience with the Rival 1 Crankset from SRAM, perfect for cyclocross, gravel, and road applications. Crafted with precision, both the axle and crank arm are made from high-quality aluminium, ensuring durability and a lightweight feel that won't slow you down. This crankset is designed to seamlessly integrate with your bike, providing a smooth and efficient transfer of power to the wheels. Whether you're tackling challenging gravel paths, speeding on the road, or navigating through a cyclocross course, this crankset is built to perform. Its aluminium construction not only guarantees a reduction in weight but also offers a stiff and responsive ride, allowing you to push your limits. The Rival 1 Crankset is a testament to SRAM's commitment to quality and performance, making it an essential upgrade for serious cyclists. With its sleek design and superior functionality, it's the perfect choice for those who demand the best in their cycling gear. Experience the difference in your ride with the Rival 1 Crankset, where every pedal stroke is optimized for maximum efficiency and speed. Upgrade your bike with this top-tier component and feel the boost in your cycling performance on every terrain.

name: Shimano GRX FC-RX820-1 Hollowtech II Crankset
description: Shimano GRX FC-RX820-1 crankset - one chainring for efficiency on any terrain The Shimano GRX FC-RX820-1 is a lightweight, very efficient 1x12-speed crank for gravel use of all kinds. The set-up with one chainring is suitable for all those who like things to be uncomplicated and are looking for an all-purpose crank for exploring, racing, high-speed section and mountain crossings. In general, this solution is affected less by dirt and mud. In combination with an appropriate cassette, the two chainring options offer you a wide range of ratios for any terrain. FC-RX820 features the proven Hollowtech II design for highly efficient power transmission and outstanding stiffness with the lowest possible weight. One reason for this is that the crank arms are hollow and, like the chainring, made of lightweight aluminium. The model has a specific bolt circle diameter of 110 mm. It produces a chainline of 49.7 mm and a Q-factor of 151 mm. 1x12-speed aluminium crank for gravel usedeveloped for mixed terrainwide range of options for the optimal gravel gear ratio and different riding stylesless susceptible to being clogged up by mud thanks to only one chainringHollowtech II: perfect balance between stiffness, stability, weight and rotational efficiencyhollow crank arms (Hollowtech)anodised crank armschainring lacquered, anodised teethaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. 1 x Shimano GRX FC-RX820-1 crankset (40-toothor42-tooth)1 x Shimano crank bolt
