The combination of chainrings with 13-tooth spacing with a high bandwidth cassette, starting with a 10-tooth sprocket, ensures well thought-out, homogeneous gear jumps and always puts you in the right gear. In combination with AXS, you can make various shift settings and personalise your drivetrain to suit you. 1 x SRAM Red AXS E1 DUB 2x12-speed carbon power meter crankset1 x SRAM chainring2 x SRAM pedal spacers

name: SRAM Rival 1 Wide DUB 1x12-speed Crankset
description: The SRAM Rival 1 Wide DUB 1x12-speed Crankset - For 1x drivetrains on gravel bikes The SRAM Rival 1 crankset is designed for 1x12-speed drivetrains with DUB bottom bracket and is perfect for gravel use thanks to its wide chainline. " Wide" means that the crank produces a larger chainline of 47.5 mm. Combined with an electronic AXS Wide front derailleur, you get more clearance for wider tyres. The X-Sync™ chainrings are mounted via Direct Mount. Gear changes are quick and smooth. If you wish, you can upgrade the crankset with the Rival DUB Wide Powermeter Upgrade Kit at a later date. wide chainline for much tyre clearancedirect, precise shiftinggood chain retention with X-Sync chainringcan be upgraded to a power meter with the matchingUpgrade Kitdurable and simple thanks to DUB technologywider shaft compatible with road and MTB bottom bracket dimensions DUB™: The unit of crankshaft and bottom bracket is the heart of the DUB technology. Stiffness meets durability. SRAM has gone a step further and made everything even easier and better. It is the system approach through the integration of chainring, crank, shaft and bottom bracket that is decisive for better drivetrain performance. X-Sync™: The X-Sync tooth design is characterised by long, rounded and slanted tooth edges with a narrow profile. Derailleur pulleys with X-Sync technology support the chain guide and remain unaffected by dust and mud. 1 x SRAM Rival Wide DUB crankset1 x SRAM chainring2 x pedal spacers

name: SRAM Force E1 DUB DM 2x12-speed Carbon Crankset
description: Elevate your cycling experience with our SRAM Force E1 DUB DM Carbon 2x12 speed crankset, designed specifically for road, triathlon, and time trial enthusiasts who demand the best in performance and durability. Crafted from high-quality carbon, the crank arms promise a blend of lightweight efficiency and robust strength, ensuring you can push your limits with confidence. The aluminium axle further complements this blend by offering a solid foundation with reduced weight, making every pedal stroke more effective and powerful. This crankset is optimized for use with SRAM Road DUB (Non-Wide) bottom brackets, guaranteeing a seamless and reliable integration for a smoother ride. Whether you're aiming to shave seconds off your time trial or seeking an unbeatable road performance, this crankset provides the technology and craftsmanship needed to elevate your ride. Its precision engineering is a testament to our commitment to quality, ensuring that every component works together flawlessly for the ultimate cycling experience. Get ready to experience unparalleled performance and durability, all while keeping your bike as light and efficient as possible.

name: SRAM GX Eagle Boost DUB DM 12-speed Crankset
description: The GX Eagle DUB DM Boost 12-speed crankset by SRAM stands for carefree pedalling This GX Eagle crankset by SRAM with direct mount and forged aluminum cranks is designed for Boost frames in conjunction with a 12-speed drivetrain. With the DUB technology, the crank optimally interact with the DUB bottom brackets and thus reliably delivers constant, harmonious performance. Each Eagle chainring can be mounted quickly and easily on the direct mount bracket. The material thickness of each individual tooth has been precisely thought out and the chainring also interlocks perfectly with the chain thanks to the X-Sync 2™ tooth profile. You give everything on every ride and don't want to worry? Then the GX Eagle Boost crank set is made for you! optimum chain control thanks to X-SYNC 2 technologyDirect-Mount chainring mount compatible with all Eagle chainringscolour matching all Eagle components X-Sync 2™: X-Sync 2 is the latest development in X-Sync technology. The high, angular and at the same time narrow tooth profile of the chainring with rounded edges increases chain tension and efficiency when pedalling. The life of the chainring is longer because X-Sync 2 reduces friction and the accumulation of dirt. DUB: The unit of crankshaft and bottom bracket is the heart of the DUB technology. Stiffness meets durability. SRAM has gone a step further and made everything even easier and better. It is the system approach through the integration of chainring, crank, shaft and bottom bracket that is decisive for better drivetrain performance. 1 x SRAM GX Eagle Boost DUB crankset1 x SRAM 32-tooth chainring2 x SRAM pedal spacersnot incl. bottom bracket

name: Shimano Dura-Ace FC-R9200-P Hollowtech II Power Meter Crank w/o Chainrings
description: The Dura-Ace FC-R9200-P Crank by Shimano - Power meter with high accuracy Thanks to the Shimano FC-R9200-P crank, here in the version without chainrings, you can equip your Dura-Ace 2x12-speed road bike groupset with a power meter on both sides. This gives you access to information about your overall performance, cadence, torque efficiency, left-right balance and round pedalling. The accuracy of the total of 24 strain gauges is even higher than the previous model, with a deviation of only 1.5%. Thanks to Bluetooth and ANT+ radio protocol, there is broad compatibility with bike computers and similar devices. The lithium-ion battery is located in control unit on the crank spider, which you can easily recharge yourself. If it is completely full again after about 2.5 hours, it will last for at least 300 hours. By the way, the charging cable is the same as for your Dura-Ace Di2 shifter. You can also carry out firmware updates via the E-Tube Project. On the housing of the control unit, you will find an LED that signals the battery charge level and a button for easy zero calibration. Of course, the entire construction is waterproof and there is active temperature compensation, so you don't have to worry about the weather. You can attach the magnet for cadence measurement to the chainstay, seat tube or down tube using the included positioning tool. Apart from these special features, the FC-R9200-P is technically identical to the " normal" Dura-Ace crank. It converts your power into propulsion in a highly efficient manner, is characterised by an optimal stability/weight ratio thanks to the Hollowtech II design and inspires with precise, fast shifting processes. The crank arms are hollow-formed, which results in a significant weight saving. Except for the axle, all essential parts were made of lightweight metal. FC-R9200-P has an asymmetrical 4-arm bolt circle diameter of 110 mm. It produces a chainline of 44.5 mm and has a Q-factor of 148 mm. Information on the return and disposal of used batteries and electrical equipment can be found here . *not transmitted via Bluetooth connections 2x12-speed: power measurement on both sides via 24 strain gaugesmore accurate measurement than previous modelintegrated, rechargeable lithium-ion battery with long service lifecharging time approx. 2.5 hours, same charging cable as Di2waterproof constructionactive temperature compensation (operating temperature range -10 °C to +50 °C)simple zero-point calibration via button on the control unit or bicycle computercontrol unit with LED display for battery charge level (green, red, flashing red)firmware updates via E-Tube Projectperfect balance between stiffness, stability, weight and rotational efficiencyoptimised power transferfast, high-precision shifting at the fronthollow crank arms (Hollowtech)anodised crank armsaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. Second-Generation Power Meters Shimano second-generation power meters use an improved force vector analysis and are therefore more accurate than their predecessors. Both crank arms have 12 sensors each, which are mounted in such a way that the crank deformation can be compensated for and the acting forces can be identified. The right and left sides are connected via the battery located in the axle, ensuring accurate measurement on both sides. The built-in temperature compensation contributes to the precision. You can easily recharge the battery with the Di2 charging cable EW-EC300. The power meters have Bluetooth and ANT+ compatibility to communicate with bike computers and smartphones. For firmware updates and data display, Shimano provides the E-Tube Project Cyclist App or the E-Tube Ride App. A more detailed performance analysis is possible via Shimano Connect Lab software. 1 x Shimano Dura-Ace FC-R9200-P power meter crank1 x Shimano crank bolt1 x Shimano EW-EC300 charging cable, 1.5 m1 x installation ring for left crank arm1 x magnets1 x magnet cover, black1 x magnet cover, white2 x double-sided adhesive tape rolls1 x Shimano TL-FC40 crank tool for left crank arm1 x cover cap for left crank arm1 x positioning tool for magnet4 x chainring bolts Dura-Ace FC-R9200 chainrings

name: SRAM GX Eagle Transmission T-Type DUB DM 12-speed Crankset
description: The SRAM GX Eagle Transmission T-Type 12-speed crankset for DUB bottom brackets with Direct Mount chainring - reliable and robust This 12-speed crankset from SRAM comes from the GX Eagle Transmission series for use on mountain bikes in various areas of application and scores above all with an outstanding price-performance ratio. The crank arms are made of forged aluminium. With its T-Type design, the chainring is optimised for corresponding chains and is assembled via Direct Mount. The removable plastic bash guards that protect the chainring from damage, e.g. from kicked-up stones, are another eye-catcher. The connection to the bottom bracket is made using proven DUB technology. name: Shimano SLX FC-M7100-1 Hollowtech II Crank
description: The Shimano SLX FC-M7100-1 cranks - an efficient, safe drivetrain The Shimano SLX FC-M7100 12-speed crank produces a chainline of 52mm when ridden with a single chainring. It is based on a direct-mount system, which significantly speeds up chainring changes. In combination with a single chainring that has Shimano Dynamic Chain Engagement+ technology (not included), good chain retention, efficiency and low noise are guaranteed. Hollow-forged crank arms reduce weight while providing highly-efficient power transmission. The FC-M7100 crank was designed for leisure and training, not so much for racing. It can also be fitted with two chainrings, resulting in the model FC-M7100-2 for a 48.8 mm chainline. name: Shimano CUES FC-U6000-1 Crankset
description: Shimano CUES FC-U6000-1 - 2-piece crank with one chainring for city, touring and MTB The CUES crankset FC-U6000-1 was designed by Shimano for Linkglide drivetrains in sporty city, touring and mountain bike use. It is suitable for 1x9-speed, 1x10-speed and 1x11-speed gears. The special tooth profile of the chainring efficiently guides the chain even in rougher terrain and prevents it from jumping off. The 2-piece design of the crank provides an optimal stiffness-to-weight ratio and improves power transfer. The size of the chainring is chosen so that it can be pedalled harmoniously and comfortably on different types of terrain. The 30 and 32-tooth versions have a chainline of 52 mm, which makes them compatible with frame over locknut dimensions of up to 148 mm. For the 40 and 42-tooth versions, the chainline is 50 mm, so only dimensions up to 142 mm are compatible. The Q-factor is 180 mm for all versions. The crank is mainly made of aluminium; the chainring is made of steel. Rear Over Locknut Dimension: Quick Release: 135 mm, 141 mm (30 T, 32 T) / 135 mm (40 T, 42 T)Thru-Axle: 142 mm, 148 mm (30 T, 32 T) / 142 mm (40 T, 42 T) 2-piece crank with one chainring for sporty city, touring and MTB useexclusively for Shimano Linkglide drivetrains (9-speed, 10-speed, 11-speed)excellent chain hold thanks to special tooth shapeexcellent power transfer for more fun rideswide ratio range for harmonious, comfortable pedallinglacquered crank arms, spider and chainring 2-Piece Crankset With the 2-piece designed cranks from Shimano, the right crank arm is precisely matched to the interaction with the bottom bracket. This increases the stiffness and keeps the weight low. Further spaced bearings also improve strength and contribute to more pedalling efficiency. The precision manufacturing of the bearings ensures easy installation and low maintenance. 2-Piece cranks share a 24mm axle diameter with Hollowtech II cranks, so they are also compatible with Hollowtech II bottom brackets. Dynamic Chain Engagement+ Dynamic Chain Engagement+ is Shimano's term for a special tooth profile of single chainrings intended for off-road use. This improves the chain hold and counteracts chain drop on rough ground. It also minimises wear and increases pedaling efficiency. 1 x Shimano CUES FC-U6000-1 crankset (30, 32, 40 or 42 teeth)1 x Shimano crank bolts

description: X-Sync™: X-Sync™ 1X chainrings from SRAM provide the highest performance and durability. Long SRAM X-Sync™ tooth edges grip the chain earlier than standard triangular teeth. name: Shimano XT FC-M8000-2 Hollowtech II Crankset
description: The XT crankset FC-M8000-2 by Shimano - rider tuned and highly efficient The Shimano XT FC-M8000-2 crankset with 24-34, 26-36 or 28-38 tooth gradation is characterised by special drivetrain efficiency and competition-ready performance. It is one of three crank options in the XT 11-speed shifting system, which provides the right set-up for every type of rider and terrain according to the " Rider Tuned" principle. The FC-M8000-2 aluminium crank impresses with precise shifting as well as robustness and low weight. It is optimally tuned in terms of gear range and even pedalling rhythm (Dyna-Sys11 technology). The Hollowtech II design with fixed 24 mm axle, which has been tried and tested for many years, also ensures stability. MTB 2x11-speed: Rear Over Locknut Dimension: thru-axle: 142 mm " Rider Tuned" 11-speed drivetrain for universal use" Ride Anywhere" : different options for a variety of bikes and applicationsuniform shifts and optimised chain guidancemore durable chainring teethcomposite construction chainringdurability and low weight optimally combinedhighly efficient and precise shiftsimproved stiffness of the drivetrainnarrow gear gradations for minimal gear jumps and constant rhythmcrank arms anodised, large chainring painted, small chainring platedaluminium and stainless steel chainring bolts Dyna-Sys11 Dyna-Sys11 is the name of the 11-speed shifting system for MTBs from Shimano. The focus lies on maintaining the pedalling rhythm both on flat ground and on uphill segments. The gear ratios are selected so that you make efficient progress in the most frequently used gear range and do not have to shift gears as much (" Rhythm Step" ). Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. 1 x Shimano XT FC-M8000-2 crankset (24-34, 26-36or28-38 tooth)1 x Shimano crank bolt

name: SRAM Force E1 DUB DM 2x12-speed Carbon Powermeter Crankset
description: Elevate your cycling performance with the latest dual-sided crank power meter, designed specifically for road, triathlon, and time trial enthusiasts. This cutting-edge device, crafted from premium carbon for the crank arms and durable aluminum for the axle, ensures lightweight strength and unmatched durability. With an impressive operating time of 200 hours on a single CR2032 battery, you can focus more on your training and less on maintenance. The power meter boasts a precise measurement accuracy of 1.5 %, capturing your left/right power balance directly at the spider for detailed performance analytics. It seamlessly integrates with ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, allowing for effortless data transfer to your favorite cycling apps and devices. Recommended to pair with SRAM DUB inner bearings for optimal performance, this crank with power meter is the ultimate upgrade for cyclists seeking to push their limits. Whether you're aiming to improve your personal best in a time trial or striving for efficiency in your triathlon transitions, this power meter provides the insights needed to achieve your goals.

name: Shimano GRX FC-RX810-1 Hollowtech II Crankset
description: Shimano GRX FC-RX810-1 crankset - 1x11-speed for mixed terrain The Shimano GRX FC-RX810-1 crank offers you optimal performance on mixed surfaces and riding styles. Narrower gear increments allow you to keep the pedal rhythm on any terrain. A chainline further out ensures compatibility with wider tyres. The single chainring features Shimano's Dynamic Chain Engagement technology so you don't have to worry about the chain dropping. Of course, the FC-RX810-1 crankset is also based on the Hollowtech II system, which has been tried and tested for years. Are you interested in the GRX series? Then have a look at our Shimano gravel site . You will find many more products there. tighter shifts ensure a constant rhythm on known routesoptimal gear change for mixed terrain and different riding styleslarger front rangehollow crank arms (Hollowtech)anodised crank arms, painted chainringaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. 1 x Shimano GRX FC-RX810-1 crankset (40or42-tooth)1 x Shimano crank bolt

name: SRAM SX Eagle PowerSpline 1x12-speed crankset
description: Elevate Your Ride with the SX Eagle PowerSpline Crankset by SRAM for All Mountain and MTB Adventures Discover the perfect blend of performance and durability with the SX Eagle PowerSpline crankset 1x12-speed by SRAM, designed specifically for All Mountain, Cross Country, Enduro, and MTB enthusiasts. Crafted from high-quality aluminum, this crankset not only ensures a lightweight addition to your ride but also guarantees the strength needed to tackle the most challenging terrains. Its 12-speed compatibility offers you a wide range of gears, enabling you to conquer steep hills and accelerate on flat terrains with ease. The SX Eagle PowerSpline technology integrates seamlessly with your bike, providing a smooth and reliable power transfer that enhances your overall cycling experience. Whether you're an avid mountain biker or a cross-country racer, this crankset is built to elevate your performance. Its robust construction is designed to withstand the rigors of aggressive riding, ensuring longevity and reliability. Upgrade your bike with the SX Eagle PowerSpline crankset and experience the difference in your ride's quality and efficiency. Get ready to push your limits and explore new trails with confidence.

name: SRAM SX Eagle Boost 148 PowerSpline 12-speed crankset
description: Elevate Your Ride with the SX Eagle Boost 148 PowerSpline 12-speed Crankset from SRAM Discover the ultimate upgrade for your mountain biking adventures with the SX Eagle Boost 148 PowerSpline 12-speed crankset by SRAM. Designed specifically for All Mountain, Enduro, and MTB enthusiasts, this crankset promises to transform your ride. Crafted from high-quality aluminum, the crank arms are both lightweight and robust, ensuring durability and performance on even the toughest trails. The 12-speed configuration offers a wide range of gears, making it perfect for tackling steep climbs and fast descents alike. The PowerSpline interface ensures a secure and efficient connection between the crank arm and the bottom bracket, maximizing power transfer with every pedal stroke. Whether you're upgrading your current setup or building your dream bike, the SX Eagle Boost crankset is a must-have for serious riders. Its sleek design not only enhances the look of your bike but also its functionality. Say goodbye to compatibility worries, as this crankset is designed to work seamlessly with Boost 148 hub spacing, providing improved wheel stiffness and better handling. Elevate your mountain biking experience with the precision and reliability of SRAM's SX Eagle Boost crankset.

name: Rohloff Speedhub 500/14 CC quick release 135 mm gear hub
description: Experience the world - The Speedhub 500/14 gear hub by Rohloff You love cycling. You love to escape from the stress and hectic goings-on of daily life. It's good that the Rohloff gears on your bike support you in this. This is because the Speedhub gearbox makes cycling very easy. Don't worry about whether the right gear is engaged, just turn the gear lever - even when stationary. With a twist, you can shift into any of the 14 gears. In addition, the Speedhub is extremely low-maintenance. Experience gears that requires minimal maintenance. One quick oil change a year, that's all it takes. After that, it's just a matter of keeping an eye on the chain, chainring and rear sprocket. No comparison to conventional multiple derailleurs and their sensitive rear derailleurs. Rohloff wants you to ride, not wait. The legendary Rohloff quality also includes the price-performance ratio of the gearbox. It is amazingly durable and also incurs minimal costs for its functionality. Enjoy an investment that pays off; because with every kilometre ridden, the cost balance improves compared to all other current derailleurs. The Speedhub is so robust that it has even been certified to run more than 300,000 kilometres. One of the most important reasons why the best touring cyclists in the world swear by the Speedhub. There is hardly a spot on earth, no matter how exotic, where the Rohloff gear hub has not been seen. Thanks to the Rohloff modular system, many different hub variants are created. For selecting the desired version, the Online Configurator is very helpful. extremely low maintenance and robustperfect workmanship (99% Made in Germany)smooth shifting (13.6%) with rotary shift name: Shimano Alfine Gear Hub SG-S7001-8 Disc Center Lock
description: Alfine internally geared hub SG-S7001-8 by Shimano - for an efficient cadence The Shimano Alfine SG-S7001-8 internally geared hub is an 8-speed hub that is compatible with Center Lock disc brakes. It has a range of over 300 percent (Inter-8) and closely spaced shifts to maintain an even cadence. Also its quiet function and the shift force support make the SG-S7001-8 the ideal partner for every City bike. Of course you can also use the Alfine internally geared hub on e-bikes. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. * not recommended for disc brakes top normal orientationsilent freehubshift servoshift power modulatorhigh efficiencyanodisedoptimised overall riding comfort and efficiencyhigher shifting capacity even with the high chain tension typical for e-bike motorsoptimisation: suitable for both e-bikes and conventional bicycles Inter-8 Shimano 8-speed gear hubs with Inter-8 technology have a total gear ratio of over 300 percent. Due to the close gradation of the gears, they enable a smooth, efficient cadence and thus greater comfort while riding. Gear Change Support Gear Change Support is a shift servo technology on Shimano gear hubs. It ensures that you can downshift quickly, precisely and without using a lot of force, as it uses part of the pedal force for this process. The pedal force acts against the shift cylinder to overcome its counterpressure and execute the gear change. The shifting force is thus reduced by 40%. 1 x Shimano Alfine SG-S7001-8 internally geared hub1 x Shimano Center Lock cover

name: Shimano Shift lever
description: The Alfine shifter SL-S7000-8 by Shimano - Rapidfire Plus for internally geared hubs The Shimano Alfine SL-S7000-8 shifter can be used for Alfine 8-speed internally geared hubs with the CJ-S7000-8 shift unit. It can be mounted on handlebars with a 22.2 mm clamp diameter and features an easy-to-read gear indicator. As a Rapidfire Plus model, the SL-S7000-8 allows the release lever to be operated with the index finger (pull) or thumb (push). The housing is made of aluminium (black or silver), the levers are made of steel / resin. Cable and SP41 cable housing are included. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. cable adjust Alfine SG-S7000-8 internally geared hubsAlfine SG-S7001-8 internally geared hubsCJ-S7000-8 shifting unitEP8 EP801 e-bike series for Urban / TouringEP8 EP800 e-bike series for Urban / TouringEP6 e-bike series for Urban / Touring22.2 mm clamp diameterhandlebar grip diameter up to a maximum of 32 mm gear indicator (above the handlebars)max. number of gears per shift: 1painted housing Rapidfire Plus Rapidfire Plus is a type of Shimano shift lever construction that has been common in the mountain bike sector since 1985. Two levers, the main lever and the release lever, are used instead of a twist shifter. Rapidfire Plus shift levers, as the name suggests, ensure fast shifting. In addition, depending on the model, it is possible to downshift up to three gears with one shift stroke. 2-Way-Release With 2-Way-Release, the shifter can be pressed and pulled to shift to the smaller sprocket or chainring. This allows you to adjust the shifting process to your personal preferences. Most Rapidfire Plus shifters are equipped with 2-Way Release. 8-speed: 1 x Shimano Alfine SL-S7000-8 shifter, incl. gear indicator1 x Shimano cable1 x cable housing (2100 mm)1 x cable housing mounting set

name: Rohloff Splined sprocket Speedhub
description: Quick replacement: the Plug-In Sprockets for Speedhub by Rohloff Since 2016, Rohloff has equipped all hubs in the current series with a splined sprocket system. Turning or replacing a sprocket is then very easy without a chain whip or cassette removal tool. Due to the same component basis (screw connection), existing hubs can be retrofitted or converted with this splined system. When converting from screw-on to plug-in sprockets, please also order the Splined Carrier or, in special cases, Splined Carrier S. Rohloff offers a template to check for collisions between the frame strut and the sprocket. When using the plug-in sprocket system, the chain tensioner requires the long frame bolt . The use of a closed chain guard (Hebie etc.) must be checked individually for compatibility. Due to the extended number of teeth, many chainring / sprocket combinations are possible. The permissible or desired transmission ratio can be determined with the Gears-Meters Table . In practice, a gear ratio (chainring: sprocket) of 2.5 - 2.8 has been proven to be suitable for touring/everyday use. However, if you are travelling off-road and in the mountains, you can choose your own individual gear ratio down to a minimum factor of 1.9. 1 x Rohloff splined sprocket

name: Shimano Alfine Shifting Lever SL-S503 8-speed
description: The Alfine SL-S503 shifter by Shimano - compatible with shift unit CJ-8S40 The Shimano Alfine SL-S503 8-speed shifter can be used for the Alfine SG-S501 and for Nexus C6000 internally geared hubs with shifting unit CJ-8S40. Like all Rapidfire Plus shifters it features the 2-Way Release function, so the release lever can be operated by pulling with the index finger as well as by pressing with the thumb. The SL-S503 presents itself modern and sporty and convinces with exact shifting performance. It has an aluminium housing (silver or black) and levers made of synthetic resin and steel. name: Shimano Alfine Shift Lever SL-S700 11-speed
description: The Alfine SL-S700 shifter by Shimano - visually and technically attractive The Shimano Alfine SL-S700 11-speed shift lever fits perfectly on any City bike thanks to its stylish appearance. It also boasts numerous technical refinements: As a Rapidfire Plus lever, with which several gears can be shifted down at once and it has the 2-Way Release function. This means that the shift cable can be released either by pressing with the thumb or pulling with the index finger. Added to this are Instant Release technology for super-fast shifting and Multi Release for equally fast shifting in both directions. SL-S700 is compatible with Alfine SG-S7001-11 internally geared hubs with shifting unit CJ-S700. It has an integrated visual gear indicator and is available in silver or black. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. cable adjust Alfine SG-S7001-11 internally geared hubsCJ-S700 shifting unitEP8 EP801 e-bike series for Urban / TouringEP8 EP800 e-bike series for Urban / TouringEP6 e-bike series for Urban / Touring22.2 mm clamp diameterhandlebar grip diameter up to a maximum of 32 mm gear indicator (above the handlebars)max. number of gears per shift: 2painted housing Rapidfire Plus Rapidfire Plus is a type of Shimano shift lever construction that has been common in the mountain bike sector since 1985. Two levers, the main lever and the release lever, are used instead of a twist shifter. Rapidfire Plus shift levers, as the name suggests, ensure fast shifting. In addition, depending on the model, it is possible to downshift up to three gears with one shift stroke. 2-Way-Release With 2-Way-Release, the shifter can be pressed and pulled to shift to the smaller sprocket or chainring. This allows you to adjust the shifting process to your personal preferences. Most Rapidfire Plus shifters are equipped with 2-Way Release. Instant Release With Instant Release, the spring and thus the cable are released immediately when the lever is actuated, which ensures an enormously fast shifting process. The delay caused by a two-step shifting process with click and release is eliminated, so that the gear change is considerably accelerated and improved. Multi Release With the Multi Release, which only affects the right-hand shift lever, two gears can be shifted with one actuation of the release lever without loss of shifting speed. This is independent of whether you use a Top-Normal or a Low-Normal rear derailleur. 11-speed: 1 x Shimano Alfine SL-S700 shifter, incl. gear indicator1 x Shimano cable , incl. cable housing (2100 mm)1 x cable housing mounting set

name: Rohloff Chain tensioner-10 for XXL hubs
description: For fatbikes and singlespeed: the Chain Tensioner-10 by Rohloff In addition to the Rohloff standard chain tensioner for Speedhub 54 mm chainline, there is also the chain tensioner-10. This is required for the Rohloff Speedhub 148 mm Boost hub and the XXL hubs with 190 and 197 mm. The chain tensioner-10 is also suitable for use with other hub gears and/or for use on singlespeed bikes. Depending on the derailleur hanger thickness (max. 8 mm) and axial offset (aV), a chainline of 42-50 mm (aV=0) and 50-58 mm (aV=7.5) can be achieved. The Rohloff chain tensioner-10 has a tensioning capacity of 10 links and a chain line that is offset 10 mm inwards. It is screwed into the derailleur hanger of the frame with a fastening bolt. The lateral position is adjusted via spacers. chain tensioner with 10 mm inwardly offset chain linefor fatbikes with Rohloff Boost or XXL hubs as well as for other hub gears and singlespeedsadditional mount for Shimano Direct Mount 8250-10 1 x Rohloff chain tensioner1 x short frame bolt1 x long frame bolt4 x spacers, 1 mm2 x spacers, 3 mm

name: Shimano CS-S500 Sprocket for Alfine
description: Shimano CS-S500 sprocket for Alfine - with integrated chain guard The Shimano CS-S500 sprocket is an accessory for Alfine 8-speed and 11-speed internally geared hubs when used in combination with vertical dropouts, the CT-S500 chain tensioner and the FC-S501 crank with double chain guard. It can also be used on certain e-bike drivetrains with internally geared hubs. The sprocket is available with 18 and 20 teeth and comes with a special chain guard ring. It is made of steel and is 2 mm thick. Its optimised tooth profile prevents the chain from falling off. name: Rohloff Chain tensioner
description: Keeps your chain securely under tension: the Rohloff Chain Tensioner Efficient cycling requires a chain that's always well-tensioned. A chain tensioner is necessary on all bicycles with rear suspension, as the chain length changes when the suspension is compressed and released (exception: drive swingarm). A chain tensioner is also necessary for all hardtails and systems with a drive swingarm where the chain cannot be tensioned (i.e. without adjustable dropouts, horizontal dropouts with a long slot or eccentric bottom bracket). The standard chain tensioner is suitable for all typical frames and a chainline of 54 mm. It has a clamping capacity of 10 links. It is attached to the frame via the derailleur hanger. The position of the chain tensioner can be adjusted to the chainline of the bicycle using the included spacers. The chain tensioner can be swivelled to the rear for quick wheel removal. standard chain tensionercan be swivelled to the rearadditional mount for Shimano Direct Mountchain tensioner armavailable as spare part 8250 1 x Rohloff chain tensioner1 x short frame bolt1 x long frame bolt4 x spacers, 1 mm2 x spacers, 3 mm

name: Rohloff Speedhub 500/14 TS screw axle tandem 135 mm gear hub
description: Experience the world - The Speedhub 500/14 gear hub by Rohloff You love cycling. You love to escape from the stress and hectic goings-on of daily life. It's good that the Rohloff gears on your bike support you in this. This is because the Speedhub gearbox makes cycling very easy. Don't worry about whether the right gear is engaged, just turn the gear lever - even when stationary. With a twist, you can shift into any of the 14 gears. In addition, the Speedhub is extremely low-maintenance. Experience gears that requires minimal maintenance. One quick oil change a year, that's all it takes. After that, it's just a matter of keeping an eye on the chain, chainring and rear sprocket. No comparison to conventional multiple derailleurs and their sensitive rear derailleurs. Rohloff wants you to ride, not wait. The legendary Rohloff quality also includes the price-performance ratio of the gearbox. It is amazingly durable and also incurs minimal costs for its functionality. Enjoy an investment that pays off; because with every kilometre ridden, the cost balance improves compared to all other current derailleurs. The Speedhub is so robust that it has even been certified to run more than 300,000 kilometres. One of the most important reasons why the best touring cyclists in the world swear by the Speedhub. There is hardly a spot on earth, no matter how exotic, where the Rohloff gear hub has not been seen. Thanks to the Rohloff modular system, many different hub variants are created. For selecting the desired version, the Online Configurator is very helpful. version with longer shift cables for tandem useextremely low maintenance and robustperfect workmanship (99% Made in name: Favero Assioma Pro RS-2 Power Meter Pedals
description: Unleash your full potential on the road with the latest dual-sided power meter pedals, designed for the avid cyclist who demands precision and efficiency. These cutting-edge pedals, compatible with Shimano SPD-SL cleat systems, are crafted from durable plastic with stainless steel axles, ensuring long-lasting performance and reliability. With ANT+ and Bluetooth connectivity, you can easily pair them with your favorite cycling devices to monitor your performance in real-time. Experience unparalleled accuracy with a measurement precision of 1.00%, capturing a wide range of metrics including current power (0-3000 watts), cadence (30-190 rpm), left-right balance (0-100%), torque efficiency, pedal stroke smoothness, and comprehensive cycling dynamics. These pedals are designed without pins, featuring a 3-hole cleat mounting system that's ideal for road applications. Powered by a lithium-ion battery, enjoy over 50 hours of operating time, ensuring you stay connected and informed on the longest rides. Whether you're training for a race or simply aiming to improve your cycling performance, these power meter pedals provide the insights you need to achieve your goals. Get ready to pedal your way to peak performance with these advanced, dual-sided power meter pedals.

name: Favero Assioma Pro RS-1 Power Meter Pedals
description: Unleash your full potential with the latest innovation in cycling technology: the clipless pedals designed specifically for road, triathlon, and time trial athletes. These advanced pedals are equipped with ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, ensuring seamless connectivity with your cycling devices to monitor your performance in real-time. The pedal body, crafted from durable plastic, and the stainless steel axle, promise longevity and resilience under the most demanding conditions. With an impressive operating time of over 50 hours on a single lithium-ion battery charge, these pedals are designed to last through your longest rides. Experience precision like never before with accurate power measurements ranging from 0 to 3000 watts and cadence measurements between 30 to 190 rpm. The pedals also offer detailed Cycling Dynamics analysis, including right-left balance, power phase, and platform center offset, alongside torque efficiency and pedal stroke smoothness on the left side. This wealth of data ensures you have all the metrics you need to refine your technique and boost your performance. The 3-hole cleat mounting system is compatible with Shimano SPD-SL pedal systems, providing a secure and efficient interface for your cycling shoes. Despite their advanced features, these pedals come without pins, emphasizing a sleek design focused on performance and efficiency. Whether you're pushing your limits on the road, tackling a triathlon, or racing against time, these clipless pedals with integrated power measurement are your ticket to a new personal best.

name: REVERSE Components Expert XD Singlespeed Kit
description: With the Expert Singlespeed Kit XD from REVERSE Components, you can convert your full-suspension bike to singlespeed in no time, reduce derailleur maintenance, and prevent potential damage. The set, featuring an integrated sprocket guide, ensures that your chain stays securely in place. CNC-machined aluminum guide plates, combined with the updated tooth profile of the rear cog, provide precise and reliable chain guidance. Thanks to the specially designed hole pattern, the rear cog remains free of dirt and debris even under extreme conditions. The kit includes a CNC-machined steel cog, spacers, and guide plates. Whether you’re shredding your home trails or making the most of a bike park holiday, this singlespeed kit will put derailleur problems firmly in the past.

name: Shimano XT CS-M771-10 Cassette + CN-HG95 10-speed Chain Wear & Tear Set
description: The Shimano XT CS-M771-10 + CN-HG95 Wear & Tear Set - Hyperglide and SIL-TEC This Shimano XT wear set consists of CS-M771 10-speed cassette and CN-HG95 10-speed chain. Benefit from the combined advantages of Hyperglide technology and SIL-TEC coating. With the Shimano XT CS-M771-10 cassette, the six large sprockets are mounted on two spiders so that a large contact surface and a low weight can be achieved. Hyperglide technology (HG) ensures fast, smooth and silent gear changes, which are further supported by the Dyna-Sys system. Shimano's Dyna-Sys is not just about 10-speed gearing, but about optimal power transfer and traction. The Shimano CN-HG95 is a 10-speed chain with directional binding and double SIL-TEC surface treatment: on the outer plate and inner plate. This ensures quiet, low-maintenance operation. This Dyna-Sys chain type HG-X is compatible with all 2x10 and 3x10 MTB and touring drivetrains. name: Shimano XT CS-M8000 Cassette + CN-HG701 11-speed Chain Wear & Tear Set
description: The Shimano XT CS-M8000 + CN-HG701 Wear & Tear Set - Rhythm Step and SIL-TEC This Shimano XT 11-speed wear set includes the CS-M8000 cassette and the CN-HG701 Quick-Link chain. It impresses with carefully selected gradations and friction-reducing SIL-TEC coating. The Shimano XT CS-M8000 11-speed cassette offers the full range of 1x11-speed, 2x11-speed and 3x11-speed gear ratios, so there's something for every type of rider, terrain and performance level. Dyna-Sys11 technology and Rhythm Step cassette gradation ensure small gear jumps and thus a constant cadence and uninterrupted flow on the trail. 10 sprockets from the CS-M8000 are made of steel, the largest sprocket (or the 2 largest sprockets for 11-46) of aluminium. The Shimano CN-HG701 11-speed Quick-Link chain is held together by a master link. The SIL-TEC coating, based on fluorine particles and applied to inner and outer plates, ensures more efficiency, less wear and less noise. CN-HG701-11 chains are generally recommended for Ultegra and XT groupsets. There is a directional binding, so be careful during installation. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. name: Shimano SLX CS-M7100-12 Cassette + CN-M7100 12-speed Chain Wear & Tear Set
description: The Shimano SLX CS-M7100 Cassette + CN-M7100 Chain Set - For precise gear changes This Shimano SLX wear set consists of CS-M7100-12 cassette and CN-M7100 chain. This guarantees high precision, smoothness and speed when shifting gears. The Shimano SLX CS-M7100 12-speed cassette is characterised by its Hyperglide+ technology, which ensures high precision and smoothness as well as shifting speed when shifting up or down. In addition, Hyperglide+ minimises noise. CS-M7100 cassettes feature an aluminium spider and sprocket (the largest sprocket), which saves weight and contributes to durability. If the lowest possible gear jumps are important to you, then go for the 10-45 version. If you want to cover as wide a range as possible, the 10-51 gradation is the right one for you. The Shimano SLX CN-M7100 12-speed chain has been fundamentally revised to form a central component of the SLX M7100 groupset. High-precision moulded contact surfaces to chainring and cassette teeth ensure fast, but also precise and smooth shifting up and down. Shifting with the CN-M7100 chain works perfectly even under load. name: Shimano XT CS-M8100-12 Cassette + CN-M8100 12-speed Chain Wear & Tear Set
description: The Shimano XT CS-M8100 cassette + CN-M8100 chain set - for no-fuss gear changes This Shimano XT wear set consists of CS-M8100-12 cassette and CN-M8100 chain. With it, you can tackle any trail and progress smoothly even on rough terrain. The Shimano XT CS-M8100 12-speed cassette is available in 10-45 T and 10-51 T versions. If you are looking for the lowest possible amount of gear steps, then the 10-45 tooth version is a good pick. If you want to cover as much bandwidth as possible, then opt for the 10-51 tooth version. Of course, all CS-M8100-12 cassettes feature Shimano Hyperglide+ technology for high shifting speed, precision and ease in up-/down-shifting. This has the added benefit of minimising noise. The spider as well as the two largest sprockets are made of aluminium, which contributes to weight reduction, robustness and durability. The Shimano XT CN-M8100 12 chain is a central component of the XT M8100 groupset and has therefore been optimised from the ground up. High-precision moulded contact surfaces to the chainring and cassette ensure precise, fast and smooth shifting in both directions, even under load. In addition, the CN-M8100 chain has chromed inner plates that noticeably increase durability. name: Shimano Ultegra cassette CS-6700 + chain CN-6701 10-speed wear set
description: The Shimano Ultegra CS-6700 + CN-6701 Wear & Tear Set - Ideal combination of performance and precision This Shimano Ultegra wear set includes the CS-6700 cassette and the CN-6701 chain. It stands for powerful and precise shifting for the 10-speed road drivetrain. The Shimano 10-speed Ultegra cassette CS-6700 allows precise shifting, but without much effort. Shimano has even optimised the accuracy of the gear selection by changing the sprocket design. Despite all the user-friendliness, the highest precision is guaranteed with the CS-6700 cassette during the shifting process. The Shimano CN-6701 chain is designed for 2x10-speed drivetrains. Thanks to optimised outer lugs, it delivers improved performance for road bikes while maintaining the same durability and weight (compared to the CN-6700). HG technology ensures optimised contact with the chainring and cassette teeth and therefore smooth shifting. Caution, CN-6701 is directional, which must be taken into account during assembly. name: SRAM NX Eagle PG-1230 Cassette + Eagle Chain 12-speed Wear Kit
description: The NX Eagle PG-1230 cassette and an Eagle chain from SRAM for 12-speed deliver the optimal combination of performance and precision This SRAM wear & tear set for 12-speed drivetrains consists of the NX Eagle PG-1230 cassette and, depending on the choice, a PC XX1 Eagle or PC GX Eagle chain. The NX Eagle PG-1230 cassette is suited for hubs with Shimano freehub and offers a high bandwidth. Powerglide II technology enables effortless and precise gear changes thanks to its tooth design. The PC XX1 or GX chain is made for Eagle 12-speed drivetrains and shines on your mountain bike with high durability and low wear of chainrings and sprockets. Flow Link™ technology features smooth, flat tabs for precise, buttery-smooth shifting and silent operation. Hollow pins also make the XX1 Eagle chain particularly light. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. Cassette high bandwidth in combination with Shimano freehubstamped steel pinion with aluminium spideroptimised gear steps Chain inner and outer plates chrome-plated with PVD coating (XX1 rainbow only)inner plates chrome plated and outer plates nickel plated with PVD coating (only XX1 copper, XX1 gold, XX1 black)inner plates burnished and outer plates nickel-plated (GX only)Flow Link and Hard Chrome™ technologies for less wearcolour matching Eagle componentsquiet and durablestrong PowerLock master link The colour designation consists of the colour of the cassette in the first place and series and colour of the chain in the second place. PowerGlide II: A cassette technology developed for off-road riding. More reliable, more durable and more powerful - SRAM cassettes are optimised by their tooth profile and climbing aids for precise and smooth gear changes. That way you can climb every mountain effortlessly. Flow Link™: The ultra smooth inner plates of the chain are completely edge-free. This reduces friction on the cassette and chainring. The result: low-noise performance and longer component life. The chain design allows for a narrower profile. This way, the chain is much more torsion resistant. Due to their smooth outer flaps, the riveting is more uniform and the tensile strength is higher. Hard Chrome™: Chains with Hard Chrome have a four times higher (wear) resistance than other SRAM chains. This is due to the machining process for the inner links and rollers. The push-pin resistance and the overall resistance correspond to current SRAM chains. Chains with Hard Chrome last longer and are extremely stable. PowerLock™: SRAM have developed PowerLock as a tool-free, safe and consistent way to connect SRAM chains. Although the PowerLock master link does not require any special tools for assembly, each PowerLock can only be used once due to the narrow tolerance range of modern drivetrains. name: SRAM X01 Eagle XG-1295 Cassette + Eagle Chain 12-speed Wear Kit
description: The X01 XG-1295 Cassette and Eagle chain from SRAM for 12-speed fit perfectly together This SRAM wear & tear set for 12-speed drivetrains is suited for all mountain and enduro and includes an X01 Eagle XG-1295 cassette and either a PC XX1 Eagle or PC X01 Eagle chain. The SRAM XG-1295 cassette with twelve shifting levels for X01 Eagle is stable, durable and lightweight thanks to a special manufacturing process. It is also suitable for Enduro use. The X-Dome™ design provides very good torsional stiffness, while the chain guidance and shifting performance are quiet and smooth. The range of 10-52 teeth always gives you the right gear. The SRAM PC XX1 or X01 chain is made for Eagle 12-speed drivetrains and shines on your mountain bike with a lightweight, durable design. Hollow pins make the chain light, while Flow Link™ technology with smooth, flat link plates ensures precise, smooth shifting and silent operation. The chain is uncompromisingly strong without any loss of performance and extremely wear-resistant. X-Dome™: X-Dome technology creates an incredibly lightweight, accurate and durable cassette. The open design repels dirt better and gives you smoother switching performance and longer component life. X-Glide 2™: The X-Glide 2 is the next generation of X-Glide technology. It has been specially optimised for the Eagle 12-speed cassette - for fast and precise shifting performance in all gears. X-Glide technology increases chain tension on the larger sprockets. Flow Link™: The ultra smooth inner plates of the chain are completely edge-free. This reduces friction on the cassette and chainring. The result: low-noise performance and longer component life. The chain design allows for a narrower profile. This way, the chain is much more torsion resistant. Due to their smooth outer flaps, the riveting is more uniform and the tensile strength is higher. Hard Chrome™: Chains with Hard Chrome have a four times higher (wear) resistance than other SRAM chains. This is due to the machining process for the inner links and rollers. The push-pin resistance and the overall resistance correspond to current SRAM chains. Chains with Hard Chrome last longer and are extremely stable. PowerLock™: SRAM have developed PowerLock as a tool-free, safe and consistent way to connect SRAM chains. Although the PowerLock master link does not require any special tools for assembly, each PowerLock can only be used once due to the narrow tolerance range of modern drivetrains. X-Sync™: Chains with X-Sync technology are perfectly matched for use with X-Sync chainrings. X-Sync chainrings by SRAM provide the highest performance and durability. The long X-Sync tooth edges grip the chain earlier than traditional triangular teeth. The sharp and narrow tooth profile and the rounded sloping edges support chain guiding: To provide the best possible performance even on muddy terrain, the X-Sync chainrings have indentations for the inner chain links and rollers to remove dirt and mud. name: Shimano Dura-Ace Cassette CS-R9200 + Chain CN-M9100 12-speed Set
description: The Shimano Dura-Ace 12-speed Set with CS-R9200 and CN-M9100 This wear set is a match for Shimano's top Dura-Ace R9200 road groupset and consists of the CN-M9100 Quick-Link chain and the CS-R9200, the first Dura-Ace 12-speed cassette. These are characterised by Hyperglide+ technology, which ensures seamless shifting even under heavy load. You can even change gears safely and instantly when pedalling or sprinting. The gradations have been selected to ensure high gear efficiency in all situations as well as optimal acceleration. The enlarged teeth of the pinions also contribute to this. A special plus point is its compatibility: CS-R9200 not only fits on the new 12-speed freehub body, but can also be used with conventional Shimano road freehub bodies. Depending on the gradation, five or six sprockets are made of titanium, resulting in a clear weight advantage. The Shimano CN-M9100 chain has already been put through its paces in the MTB sector and is also a central component of the Dura-Ace R9200 groupset. It has enlarged inner links and thus contributes significantly to smooth shifting performance. Thanks to HG technology, vibrations are avoided, chain hold is improved and pedalling efficiency is increased. The SIL-TEC coating of the outer plates and rollers ensures smoother, low-wear running. The chain also has hollow-shaped pins to save weight. name: Shimano XT CS-M770 Cassette + CN-HG93 9-speed Chain Wear & Tear Set
description: The Shimano XT CS-M770 + CN-HG93 Wear & Tear Set - A double deal for 9-speed riders This Shimano XT wear set consists of a CS-M770 9-speed cassette and a CN-HG93 9-speed chain. It performs with fantastic reliability even on long tours. The Shimano XT CS-M770 cassette is still the cassette of choice for trekkers who want to stick with the tried-and-true 9-speed drivetrain. The sprocket carrier made of aluminium and the nine sprockets made of steel impress with perfect stiffness. Nevertheless, the cassette is so light that it does not become noticeable as annoying dead weight on long tours. Those who prefer shorter distances will also be able to benefit from the CS-M770, because Shimano has designed its XT series for the needs of different types of riders. The blasted chrome finish provides a certain shiny effect. Of course, this cassette also features the Hyperglide (HG) sprocket design, which helps to move the chain smoothly and optimally from one sprocket to the other. The Shimano CN-HG93 9-speed chain is super slim, manufactured with high precision and glides smoothly from one tooth to the other thanks to Hyperglide (HG) technology. Long-lasting performance is guaranteed by the galvanisation of the outer link plate, which makes the chain less sensitive to corrosion. name: Shimano SLX CS-HG81-10 Cassette + CN-HG95 10-speed Chain Wear & Tear Set
description: The Shimano SLX CS-HG81-10 + CN-HG95 Wear & Tear Set - Full Dyna-Sys performance This Shimano SLX wear set includes the CS-HG81 10-speed cassette and the CN-HG95 10-speed chain. It impresses with its low weight combined with high performance and the wear-reducing SIL-TEC coating. The Shimano CS-HG81-10 cassette offers low weight with high performance with spider-mounted sprocket sets. Thanks to Hyperglide technology (HG), gear changes are fast, smooth and silent. Added to this is the Dyna-Sys system, which minimises wear and optimises power transmission. The Shimano CN-HG95 is a 10-speed chain with directional binding and double SIL-TEC surface treatment: on the outer plate and inner plate. This ensures quiet, low-maintenance operation. This Dyna-Sys chain type HG-X is compatible with all 2x10 and 3x10 MTB and touring drivetrains. name: Shimano 105 CS-R7000 Cassette + CN-HG601 11-speed Chain Wear Set
description: The Shimano 105 CS-R7000 cassette + CN-HG601 chain set - a reliable partner on- and off-road This Shimano 105 wear set includes the CS-R7000 11-speed cassette and the CN-HG601 11-speed Quick-Link chain. It inspires with fluid shifting performance and long durability in use on the road or cross-country. The Shimano 105 11-speed cassette CS-R7000 comes in four high-performance gear ratios that are adapted to different rider types according to the rider-tuned principle. The HG-EV technology ensures optimum transmission ratios and reliable, fast shifting. On the road and also cross-country, the CS-R7000 cassette is completely impressive. The Shimano CN-HG601 11-speed Quick-Link chain is mounted with a master link and is the perfect choice for 105 and SLX groupsets. The durability of the super slim chain is no less than that of 10-speed chains. As it was developed in conjunction with other shifting components, it ensures optimum power transfer in a 1-speed or 2-speed system. The friction-minimising SIL-TEC coating is used on the inner flaps. name: SRAM Cassette
description: The XX1 XG-1299 Cassette and XX1 Eagle Chain Set by SRAM for 12-speed is a dream team The SRAM wear set for 12-speed drivetrains consists of the XX1 Eagle XG-1299 cassette and the PC XX1 Eagle and the PC XX1 Eagle chain. You can choose between different colour combinations. The SRAM XG-1299 cassette with 12 gears for XX1 Eagle has a special, extremel durable finish and is light, stable and durable. With the different colour options, aesthetes who want to perfectly match the colour of their bike will also get their money's worth. Its X-Dome™ construction makes it extremely torsion-resistant, while the shifting process is quiet and smooth. With a possible 10-52 teeth, the XG-1299 has an enormous range for you, with which you don't have to step off the bike, even in the steepest climbs. Or would you like to switch to a larger chainring and reach higher speeds without sacrificing climbing ability? You have all the options! The SRAM PC XX1 chain is made for Eagle 12-speed drives and stands out on your mountain bike with a light, durable design and different color options. Hollow pins make the chain light, while Flow Link™ technology with smooth, flat link plates ensures precise, smooth shifting and silent operation. The chain is uncompromisingly strong without any loss of performance and extremely wear-resistant. Even aesthetes get their money's worth thanks to the colour selection matched to Eagle components. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked E-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. 10-50: electronic XX1/X01 Eagle AXS 12-speed rear derailleursmechanical XX1/X01/GX/SX/NX Eagle 12-speed rear derailleurs, all models 10-52: electronic XX1/X01 Eagle AXS 12-speed rear derailleursCaution:The 10-52 gradation is only compatible with mechanical 12-speed rear derailleurs of theGX Eagle,X01 Eagleand XX1 Eagle series as of model 2020 and cannot be combined with older rear derailleurs. Cassette titanium nitride finishsprockets 1-11 made of milled CroMoly steellarge range of 520 % with 10-52 teethsmooth shifting over the entire rangeopen,mud resistant designcolour-coordinated with Eagle components Chain chrome-plated inner plates with PVD coatingnickel-plated outer plates with PVD coatingFlow Link and Hard Chrome™ technologies for less wearcolour matching Eagle componentsquiet, light and durablestrong PowerLock master link The colour designation consists of the colour of the cassette in the first place and series and colour of the chain in the second place. X-Dome™: X-Dome technology creates an incredibly lightweight, accurate and durable cassette. The open design repels dirt better and gives you smoother switching performance and longer component life. X-Glide 2™: The X-Glide 2 is the next generation of X-Glide technology. It has been specially optimised for the Eagle 12-speed cassette - for fast and precise shifting performance in all gears. X-Glide technology increases chain tension on the larger sprockets. Flow Link™: The ultra smooth inner plates of the chain are completely edge-free. This reduces friction on the cassette and chainring. The result: low-noise performance and longer component life. The chain design allows for a narrower profile. This way, the chain is much more torsion resistant. Due to their smooth outer flaps, the riveting is more uniform and the tensile strength is higher. Hard Chrome™: Chains with Hard Chrome have a four times higher (wear) resistance than other SRAM chains. This is due to the machining process for the inner links and rollers. The push-pin resistance and the overall resistance correspond to current SRAM chains. Chains with Hard Chrome last longer and are extremely stable. PowerLock™ SRAM have developed PowerLock as a tool-free, safe and consistent way to connect SRAM chains. Although the PowerLock master link does not require any special tools for assembly, each PowerLock can only be used once due to the narrow tolerance range of modern drivetrains. X-Sync™: Chains with X-Sync technology are perfectly matched for use with X-Sync chainrings. X-Sync chainrings by SRAM provide the highest performance and durability. The long X-Sync tooth edges grip the chain earlier than traditional triangular teeth. The sharp and narrow tooth profile and the rounded sloping edges support chain guiding: To provide the best possible performance even on muddy terrain, the X-Sync chainrings have indentations for the inner chain links and rollers to remove dirt and mud. 10-50: 10-52: 1 x SRAM XG-1299 cassette1 x SRAM PC XX1 Eagle chain1 x SRAM PowerLock master link

name: Shimano SLX CS-M7000-11 Cassette + CN-HG601 11-speed Chain Wear & Tear Set
description: Shimano SLX CS-M7000-11 + CN-HG601 Wear & Tear Set - More flow on the trail This Shimano SLX wear set consists of the CS-M7000 cassette and the CN-HG601 Quick-Link chain. It makes for a fluid drivetrain in the MTB 11-speed system and impresses with its long durability. The Shimano SLX 11-speed cassette CS-M7000-11 covers a wide range of uses with three different gradations and contributes to the consistent shifting performance of the SLX groupset. Thanks to Dyna-Sys11 technology, the rider can always maintain a constant pedalling rhythm, which benefits flow on the trail. The CS-M7000-11 is designed for 2x11-speed drivetrains. The Shimano CN-HG601 11-speed Quick-Link chain is mounted with a master link and is the perfect choice for 105 and SLX groupsets. The durability of the super slim chain is no less than that of 10-speed chains. As it was developed in conjunction with other shifting components, it ensures optimum power transfer in the 1x, 2x or 3x system. The friction-minimising SIL-TEC coating is used on the inner flaps. name: Shimano Dura-Ace Cassette CS-R9100 + Chain CN-HG901 11-speed Set
description: The Shimano Dura-Ace CS-R9100 + CN-HG901 Wear Set - Powerful and extremely lightweight This Shimano Dura-Ace 11-speed wear set consists of the CS-R9100 cassette and the CN-HG901 Quick-Link chain. It combines performance, light weight and low friction to create a top product for competition use. The Shimano Dura-Ace cassette CS-R9100 11-speed ensures smooth but reliable gear changes when downshifting and upshifting thanks to HG-EV technology. In line with Shimano's " rider tuned" philosophy, every rider will find the right gradation, especially as a version with 11-30 teeth is now also available. The six smallest sprockets of the CS-R9100 are made of steel, the five largest of weight-saving titanium. The Shimano CN-HG901-11 Quick-Link 11-speed chain is assembled with a master link. It has SIL-TEC coating on the outer link, inner link and roller, which ensures extreme friction reduction, increased performance and better self-cleaning. Hollow-formed bolts also save weight. CN-HG901-11 chains are premium products for XTR and Dura-Ace groupsets. Caution is advised during installation because of the directional binding. name: SRAM Force/Rival/X9 PG-1070 Cassette + PC-1071 Chain 10-speed Wear Set
description: PowerGlide II: A cassette technology developed for off-road riding. More reliable, more durable and more powerful - SRAM cassettes are optimised by their tooth profile and shift ramps for precise and smooth gear changes. That way you can climb every mountain effortlessly. HollowPin™: SRAM uses the HollowPin™ design on all SRAM PowerChains. HP provides stronger plate adhesion, effective front and rear gear changes, and a low weight that no other solid pin chain can match. PowerChain II: Extreme strength. Incredible precision. The Power Chain II from SRAM offers better front derailleur performance, and can upshift without sacrificing precision at the rear derailleur. The Step2™ riveting process increases the compressive force of the bolts for higher strength and durability. PowerLock™: SRAM's chain engineers have developed PowerLock™ as a tool-free, secure and consistent way to connect SRAM chains. The PowerChain II from SRAM offers better front derailleur performance, and can upshift without sacrificing precision at the rear derailleur. The Step2™ riveting process increases the compressive force of the bolts for higher strength and durability. PowerLock™: SRAM chain manufacturers have developed PowerLock™ as a tool-free, safe and consistent way to connect SRAM 10 and 11-speed chains. name: Gates CDX Belt
description: The Gates CDX belt is perfect for long-distance and off-road riding. It is 12 mm wide and consists of strong carbon fibre strands, a weather-resistant polyurethane body and a nylon running side. The back of the belt is ribbed for better dirt repellency. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. CDX Belt Drive SprocketsCDX:EXP Belt Drive Sprockets CDX level: high-end version for high loads and best performancesuitable for mud, sand, snow and ice as well as all roadsmiddle guide groove (CenterTrack)high mileageweather-resistant and wear-resistant polyurethanecarbon fibre tension memberswheel-optimised tooth profileribbed strap backnylon running side Gates Carbon Drive System The main advantages of the Gates Carbon Drive system are cleanliness, smoothness and robustness. Urban commuters as well as mountain bikers, e-bike users or leisure riders benefit from the high mileage. Oil-stained or rusty chains are a thing of the past. Clean: No lubricant means no accumulation of grease and dirt. Smooth and silent operation: no metal-to-metal contact of the chains. Light: The whole system weighs less than a standard bicycle chain. No elongation: Belt does not need to be re-tensioned or replaced. Self-cleaning: CenterTrack and MudPort profiles are specially designed to repel mud, dirt, snow or other contaminants. Consistent efficiency: The drive boasts a long service life compared to that of a conventional chain, where efficiency is significantly reduced by wear or dirt. Installing a Gates Carbon Drive Belt Drive requires a specially-made frame, therefore we strongly advise against modifying a conventional frame. Belt tension For optimal function of the Gates Carbon Drive System, correct belt tension is essential. Common tension adjustment systems include inclined or vertical dropouts, horizontally sliding dropouts (not recommended by Gates) and eccentric bottom brackets. There are several common methods to measure the tension of your Carbon Drive system, most notably the Eco Tension Tester , the Spring Tension Tester and the Gates Carbon Drive Smartphone App. Gates Carbon Drive tension recommendations are as follows: Off-road and urban - soft and even pedalling style: 40-60 Hz (35-45 lbs)Off-road and urban - strong and hard pedalling style: 60-75 Hz (45-53 lbs)Internally geared hubs: 35-50 Hz (28-40 lbs)Tandem: 60-65 Hz (45-48 lbs)Shimano STEPS: 35-45 Hz (28-35 lbs) To calculate the correct belt length, the Gates Carbon Drive Belt Calculator is available on the Gates Carbon Drive homepage. 1188 mm: 1221 mm: 1243 mm: 1265 mm: 1298 mm: 1320 mm: 1342 mm: 1375 mm: 1408 mm: 1430 mm: 1452 mm: 1507 mm: 1573 mm: 1661 mm: 1738 mm: 1826 mm: 1848 mm: 1914 mm: 1 x Gates CDX belt

name: CeramicSpeed Alpha BB86 Shimano Gravel Bottom Bracket
description: Unleash the potential of your gravel adventures with the Alpha BB86 Shimano Gravel Bottom Bracket by CeramicSpeed, designed specifically for gravel riding. This bottom bracket sets itself apart with its high-quality ceramic bearings, ensuring a smooth and efficient pedal stroke that will keep you rolling through the toughest terrains. Crafted from durable aluminium, the bottom bracket cups promise longevity and resilience against the elements. For an axle type of 24 mm, it's compatible with a wide range of cranksets, making it a versatile choice for your gravel bike. The precision engineering behind this product means you'll experience reduced friction and a noticeable improvement in your bike's performance. Whether you're tackling long, dusty trails or short, technical routes, this bottom bracket is built to withstand the rigors of gravel riding. Its easy installation process means you'll spend less time in the workshop and more time out on the trails. Say goodbye to constant maintenance and hello to uninterrupted rides, thanks to the superior quality of the ceramic bearings. Upgrade your gravel bike with the Alpha BB86 Shimano Gravel Bottom Bracket and feel the difference in your ride's efficiency and durability. Get ready to push your limits and explore new paths with confidence and ease.

name: SRAM XS-1275 12-speed T-Type Cassette for GX Eagle Transmission
description: The XS-1275 T-Type cassette from SRAM for a 12-speed drivetrain with GX Eagle Transmission The SRAM XS-1275 T-Type cassette is particularly recommended for a 12-speed mountain bike drivetrain in combination with other components from the robust entry-level GX Eagle Transmission series. Due to its robustness, it is also suited for e-bikes. The smallest sprockets are manufactured in one piece as a mini cluster, the remaining sprockets are assembled in a pindome design. Compared to Eagle cassettes, the gear gradation of the largest sprockets is more even. The X-Sync design enables outstanding shifting performance even and especially under full load. Thanks to cassette mapping, the gear changes take place along designated shift ramps, which makes the process extremely smooth. With a chainline of 55 mm, the lower chain angle is noticeable, which reduces wear and increases precision. The cassette can only be used together with an Eagle Transmission rear derailleur, with which it opens up an ideal shifting experience. As an assembly aid, the setup sprocket that you need for the correct adjustment of the rear derailleur is highlighted in colour. Before you replace components on your e-bike, please read through the guidelines for component replacement for CE-marked e-bikes/pedelecs with pedal assistance. only compatible withEagle Transmission rear derailleurs robust, inexpensive 12-speed cassette for an electronic mountain bike drivetrainlargest sprocket made of aluminium, others made of steelsmallest sprockets as one-piece mini cluster, others in pindome designexcellent shifting performance under full load thanks to X-Sync designmore consistent gear sequence than Eagle with regard to the largest three sprocketsin conjunction with 55 mm chainline, more moderate chain angle, thus higher resistance and precisionforms a functional unit with Eagle Transmission rear derailleursetup sprocket colour-coded for correct derailleur settingcassette mapping for smooth shifting along designated shift rampsalso suitable for e-bikes MINI CLUSTER™ MINI CLUSTER refers to a hybrid construction resulting in a light and strong cassette: The smallest sprockets are CNC-machined from a single block of steel, while the other sprockets are assembled with pins. This saves weight and ensures fast, precise shifting. X-Sync™ The X-Sync tooth design is characterised by long, rounded and slanted tooth edges with a narrow profile. Derailleur pulleys with X-Sync technology support the chain guide and remain unaffected by dust and mud. 00.2418.127.000 1 x SRAM XS-1275 cassette

name: SRAM Force E1 12-speed / 13-speed PowerLock Chain
description: Discover the SRAM Force E1 12-speed / 13-speed Flattop chain for your road, triathlon, or time trial bike. This state-of-the-art chain is specially designed for 12-speed and 13-speed cassettes. Its innovative, non-directional design makes installation easier and offers flexibility during setup. Featuring a solid pin construction, the chain delivers outstanding durability and reliable performance that won’t let you down. The included PowerLock chain connector ensures a secure and tool-free connection, allowing you to quickly open or close the chain. Whether you're chasing maximum efficiency on race day or looking for a long-lasting, dependable chain for training, this is the perfect blend of performance and user-friendliness. Get ready to take your ride to the next level!

name: KMC Waxed chain 12-speed
description: Elevate your cycling experience with this versatile chain, designed to keep you moving smoothly on any terrain. Whether you're tearing down mountain trails, cruising city streets, or embarking on long touring adventures, this chain is your reliable companion for both MTB and road bikes. With a size of 1/2" x 11/128" and a pin length of 5.2 mm, it's engineered for precision and durability. Compatible with 12-speed cassettes, it ensures seamless shifting and optimal performance across a wide range of gears. The chain features a convenient Chain Link (MissingLink) closure, making installation and removal a breeze without compromising on security. Its universal application across MTB, Road, City & Touring, and All Mountain biking ensures that no matter your discipline, you're covered. This chain is not directional, which simplifies the installation process, allowing you to focus more on your ride and less on maintenance. Crafted for cyclists who demand the best, this chain is a testament to performance and reliability. Get ready to push your limits and explore new paths with confidence.

name: Enduro Bearings Deep Groove Ball Bearing 6903 17 mm x 30 mm x 7 mm
description: Carefully manufactured, highly precise: the 6903 bearings by Enduro Bearings You can choose between ABEC 3 steel bearings (type 1), MAX bearings (type 2) and stainless steel bearings (type 3). ABEC 3 bearings from Enduro Bearings feature 10th-degree chrome steel balls that are twice as round as the industry standard, and manufactured to the highest standard. The treads are made of a 52100 carbon chrome steel alloy that is vacuum-generated and then hardened for extra strength and durability. A high-gloss polish ensures precision and low noise. MAX bearings are characterised by a 35 to 40 % higher load capacity than standard radial bearings. For 20 years Enduro Bearings has been manufacturing them specifically for use on mountain bike shocks. As its name indicates, MAX bearings are fitted with the maximum possible number of balls. The grooves in the races are deeper to accommodate the multiple lateral turning forces at the MTB rear pivot. The stainless steel bearings from Enduro Bearings are based on bearing balls and running surfaces made of 440C stainless steel. This material ensures maximum corrosion resistance in critical applications and environments. Stainless steel has 20% less load capacity than the 52100 chrome steel alloy used in most other Enduro Bearings, but it is far superior in terms of rust resistance. Seals and CRC marine grease provide additional water resistance. If you live in a rainy area and/or you don't leave your bike in the rain, 440C stainless steel bearings are for you. They can also be useful for headsets, as drops of sweat may be a problem there. Type 1: Type 2: Type 3: Type 1: ABEC 3 bearings with riveted steel ball cage for more durabilitychrome steel balls 10th degree = circularity is 10/1,000,000"race grooves made of carbon-chrome steel alloy, heat and cold treated (down to -190° C), minimum hardness Rockwell HRC 62, polishedLLB: widely used seal type made of nitrile rubber with steel insert, in a groove in the inner race (labyrinth bearing), two super thin sealing lips; the outer one keeps out water and contaminants, the inner one retains greaseLevel 3 in the rating of the Annular Bearing Engineer's Committee (ABEC) in terms of manufacturing tolerances and noise development Type 2: MAX bearing (MAX = maximum number of balls, without cage or partitions) with 35 % higher load capacity than standard bearings and reduced ease of movementchrome steel balls 10th degree = circularity is 10/1,000,000"race grooves made of carbon-chrome steel alloy, heat and cold treated (down to -190° C), minimum hardness Rockwell HRC 62, polishedLLU: Seal type with double lip, in a groove in the inner race; particularly resistant to dirt and dust due to increased pressure, 90% grease filling rate (Almagard Extra High Pressure Grease)Level 1 rating from the Annular Bearing Engineer's Committee (ABEC) in terms of noise, manufacturing tolerances correspond to level 3 Type 3: stainless steel bearings with superior corrosion resistance but lower load capacity for use in wet conditionsstainless steel balls 10th degree = roundness is 10/1,000,000"LLB: widely used seal type made of nitrile rubber with steel insert, in a groove in the inner race (labyrinth bearing), two super thin sealing lips; the outer one keeps out water and contaminants, the inner one retains greaseLevel 3 in the rating of the Annular Bearing Engineer's Committee (ABEC) in terms of manufacturing tolerances and noise development 1 x Enduro Bearings 6903 17 mm x 30 mm x 7 mm ball bearing

name: Shimano Ultegra FC-R8000 Hollowtech II Crankset
description: The Ultegra FC-R8000 crankset by Shimano - elegant and powerful The Shimano Ultegra FC-R8000 11-speed crankset is characterised by its outstanding power transfer efficiency and can be easily used on road bikes with disc brakes and 135 mm over locknut dimension. With a uniform bolt circle diameter of 110 mm, four different chainring combinations can be mounted on the asymmetric 4-arm spider, resulting in a wide range of uses. As a Hollowtech crank with hollow-forged aluminium arms and featuring the Hollowtech II construction, the FC-R8000 offers an optimal stiffness-to-weight ratio. The hollow-shaped outer chainring also contributes to this. Last but not least, your road bike will also be visually enhanced by the Dura-Ace-like aesthetics of the Ultegra crankset. optimised, lightweight crank arm design for excellent power transmission efficiencyrevised chainring tooth profile increases the distance to the chain for more compatibility with 135 mm over locknut dimensions and 410 mm chainstay lengthshollow crank arms (Hollowtech)hollow-formed large chainring (Hollowglide)anodised crank arms and chainringsaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. 1 x Shimano Ultegra FC-R8000 crankset (34-50, 36-46, 36-52or39-53 tooth)1 x Shimano crank bolt

name: SRAM Rival E1 DUB Power Meter Upgrade Kit
description: Elevate your road cycling experience with the latest SRAM Rival E1 DUB Powermeter Upgrade Kit, a  crank with power meter (left) version, a game-changer for cyclists who demand precision and durability. Engineered for the road, this crankset is designed with an aluminium axle and crank arm, ensuring a lightweight yet robust construction that withstands the rigors of intense cycling. Powered by a single AAA lithium battery, it boasts an impressive operating time of over 400 hours, making it a reliable companion for long rides and training sessions. This crankset is not just about endurance; it's about accuracy. With a measurement accuracy of 1.5 %, it captures the power (left) with precision, allowing you to monitor your performance closely and make necessary adjustments to your training regimen. It supports both ANT+ and Bluetooth protocols, offering seamless connectivity with your cycling devices and apps for real-time data tracking and analysis. Recommended for use with SRAM DUB inner bearings, this crankset promises a smooth and efficient power transfer, enhancing your cycling efficiency. Whether you're training for a race or simply enjoying a ride on the road, this crank with power meter (left) version is your ticket to a more informed and improved cycling performance.

name: Shimano GRX FC-RX810-2 Hollowtech II Crankset
description: Shimano GRX FC-RX810-2 crankset - 2x11-speed for Gravel riders The Shimano GRX FC-RX810-2 crankset delivers optimum performance on changing surfaces and for different riding styles. Its gear ratio, specially adapted to Gravel riding, helps to maintain your rhythm even on rough terrain. FC-RX810-2 features a chainline that is further out, ensuring compatibility with wider tyres. Of course, this Shimano crank is also based on the Hollowtech II system, which has been proven over many years. Are you interested in the GRX series? Then have a look at our Shimano gravel site . You will find many more products there. the transmission ratio is adapted to Gravel and helps to maintain rhythm even on uneven terrain with wider tyresoptimal gear change for mixed terrain and different riding styleslarger front rangehollow crank arms (Hollowtech)anodised crank arms and chainringsaluminium chainring bolts Hollowtech II Shimano Hollowtech II is a crank bottom bracket system designed to achieve an ideal ratio of stiffness, weight and rotational efficiency. It is based on an integration of the bottom bracket and the right crank arm and works with a 24 mm axle or bearing diameter, which has proven to be optimal in terms of stability. In many cases, the bearing cups are on the outside so that the load is better distributed. High-quality precision seals ensure a long service life. 1 x Shimano GRX FC-RX810-2 crankset (31-48 tooth)1 x Shimano crank bolt

Urban commuters as well as mountain bikers, e-bike users or leisure riders benefit from the high mileage. Oil-stained or rusty chains are a thing of the past. Clean: No lubricant means no accumulation of grease and dirt. Smooth and silent operation: no metal-to-metal contact of the chains. Light: The whole system weighs less than a standard bicycle chain. Installing a Gates Carbon Drive Belt Drive requires a specially-made frame, therefore we strongly advise against modifying a conventional frame. 46 tooth: 48 tooth: 50 tooth: 55 tooth: 60 tooth: 70 tooth: 1 x Gates CDX 5-Arm Front Belt Drive Sprocket
